Poi.Description: ​Arant Apartments are located in Mastihari, in the island of Kos. Every room is comfortable and they will offer you a pleasant stay.

Poi.Name: Robinson Club Daidalos
Poi.Description:
Located 60 metres above the beach, this Robinson Club on the island of Kos offers full-board accommodation with free Wi-Fi, a buffet restaurant and a large pool. Kos Airport is 5 km away.

Each air-conditioned room at the Robinson Club Daidalos has a balcony or terrace, satellite TV and a separate toilet. Most offer views of the Mediterranean Sea.

Guests can use a huge variety of leisure facilities at the Robinson Daidalos, such as the Wellfit gym, a spa centre and 10 tennis courts.​

Poi.Name: Wave Hotel
Poi.Description: The Wave hotel is a small, friendly, family run hotel that is spotlessly clean. The people there are nice and helpful. There is a kitchen to use whenever you want to.

Poi.Name: Akti Beach Club Hotel
Poi.Description:
Akti Beach Club Hotel is ideally located on a sandy beach 4 km from Kardamena town, 10 km from airport and 20 km from Kos town. ​

​The Hotel has 189 rooms that fit to both families and couples and consists of 14 separate wing Bungalow complex, spread out in 45.000 sq. meters of beautiful gardens.​

Poi.Name: Luis Apartments
Poi.Description: ​The Luis Hotel Apartments are housed in two adjacent buildings. They are set well back from the main route between Mastichari and Antimchea.  They are located in a quiet “cul-de-sac” shared only by a couple of other hotel / studio buildings and used only by a few local residents with nearby domestic property.

Poi.Name: Sea Breeze Hotel
Poi.Description: ​Sea Breeze is a small family owned hotel, which is located in a small fish village in kos island. Their guest are mostly friends, that go again and again back in Mastichari. The owners are greatful that they live in Kos island and they can have a clean and warm place in which they host their friends.

Poi.Name: Aslanis Village
Poi.Description:
Located in a palm-tree garden 800 metres from Marmari Beach in Kos, Aslanis Village offers a pool and a restaurant. It features apartments with free Wi-Fi and a private balcony with Aegean Sea views.

A kitchenette with cooking rings, fridge and dining area is included in all apartments at the Aslanis. Each is equipped with an LCD satellite TV and air conditioning.

A breakfast buffet is served in the dining area while Greek specialities and international dishes are provided at the restaurant. Once a week guests can enjoy a Greek night with traditional food and dancing. Drinks and light meals are served at the pool bar.

There is a mini market and a gift shop on site. A playground and a children’s pool are available for younger guests.

The bus stop is only 50 metres from the hotel. Kos International Airport is at 7 km. The famous resort of Tigaki is within a 5-minute drive. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can arrange car rental and free private parking is possible at the hotel.

Poi.Name: Alice Springs Hotel
Poi.Description:
​Alice Springs is a family run hotel that is located in Kos Island, a part of the picturess Dodecanese Islands in the Greek mediterranean.
It offer spacious, air conditioned double rooms & apartments within 80 meters of beautiful Lambi beach.     
The center of the city is a mere 1.5K walk or alternately 50m to the bus stop.

Poi.Name: Athina Hotel
Poi.Description: ​Hotel Athina is located in the area of Lambi, just meters from the nearest Mini Market and one street away from the beach of Lambi.

Poi.Name: Boheme Hotel
Poi.Description:
Located 1 km away from the main town of Kos, Boheme Hotel offers self-catering accommodation and a swimming pool. The beach of Lambi is just 200 metres away.

Boheme studios and apartments are bright and spacious. Each air-conditioned unit comes with a kitchenette with fridge, where guests can prepare their own meals. All rooms also have a balcony enjoying views to the pool and the hotel’s garden.

The swimming pool area is surrounded by lush greenery and features free sun beds and umbrellas. Children can swim safely in their own pool.

Kos Airport is at 25 km. The popular sandy beach of Tigaki can be reached within a 15-minute drive. Free Wi-Fi is available in the lobby and the bar and free private parking is available near the premises.

Poi.Name: Ξενοδοχείο Frosini
Poi.Description: ​The Frosini Hotel is at the end of the port of Kos, in a very nice and quiet area to stay, with the center of Kos a few hundred meters away.

Poi.Name: Kosta Palace
Poi.Description:
Kosta Palace is in the center of Kos Town. The rooftop terrace, swimming pool and bright rooms offer stunning views of the Aegean Sea and the medieval castle. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout.

Featuring floor-to-ceiling windows, all units come with a satellite TV and fridge. Free toiletries and a hairdryer are offered. Some accommodation types also include a kitchenette with a microwave oven.

Kosta Palace has a spacious lobby, where guests will find a satellite TV.​

Poi.Name: Kos Aktis Art Hotel
Poi.Description:
From their beds, guests can enjoy views of the turquoise colours of the sea through the glass-facade balcony. A piece of glass in the wall separates the bathroom from the bedroom giving a sense of transparency in the room. All Kos Aktis Art Hotel rooms are air-conditioned and equipped with minibar, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

H2O Bar Restaurant offers Mediterranean and international dishes and a select wine list. A rich breakfast is served daily. The bar's large terrace is the perfect place to relax with the sounds and colours of the sea. An on-site gym is featured.

Poi.Name: Porto Bello Beach
Poi.Description:
​Situated on the Southern coast of Kos, the Porto Bello Royal is a cosmopolitan 5 star ultra all inclusive resort, 3 Km away from the village of Kardamena and 9 Km from Kos Hippocrates International airport.
The Hotel is made in a superb Mediterranean design, with one storey mansions and bungalows, with a total of 310 Luxury rooms and Suites. The service is second to none, the location is perfect. Surrounded by water gardens with a magnificent view of the Mediterranean Sea and the volcanic island of Nissyros, its ambience is delightfully tranquil. Just a stone's throw from the private beach, a gorgeous gold-dust slice of sands that melts into sapphire-blue seas. Fifteen pools to choose from, including an outdoor children’s pool and elegant indoor pool. A rare place where sophistication and fun co-exist in perfect harmony.

Poi.Name: Sophia Beach
Poi.Description: ​Right on the waterfront, on the outskirts of the city Sofia, Beach promises an unforgetable experience.

Poi.Name: Nefeli Hotel
Poi.Description:
Just 150 metres from the pebbled Lambi Beach, Nefeli Hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool and children’s pool. All units have balconies with garden and pool views and studios feature kitchenettes. 

On-site leisure options include a games room equipped with billiards and table tennis facilities. Nefeli’s guests can relax at the pool bar with free access to sun loungers and umbrellas. A restaurant and bar are available for meals, snacks and drinks. On-site barbecue facilities are also offered. 

All rooms and studios are air-conditioned and equipped with satellite TV, fridge and hairdryer. Hotel staff at the Nefeli can arrange car rental and schedule excursions and tours. Free Wi-Fi is provided in public areas.

Lambi Beach provides a wide selection of water sports facilities as well as tavernas and bars. Hotel Nefeli’s guests are within 3 km from the lively town of Kos with many spots of archaeological interest. Kos Port is at 3 km and Kos International Airport is 26 km away.​​

Poi.Name: The Aeolos Beach Hotel
Poi.Description: ​The “Greek island style” influences the hotel’s architecture and decoration. Steeped in the Mediterranean nature, surrounded by gardens with a beautiful green lawn and a long, sandy beach, it offers visitors a breathtaking view.​

Poi.Name: Kalimera Mare
Poi.Description:
Kalimera Mare lies just 95 metres from the shore, 3 km from Kardamena. It has a swimming pool and offers air-conditioned rooms with private balcony overlooking the sea, and the hotel grounds.

The hotel is walking distance from a sandy beach. Kalimera Mare is 10 km from Kos International Airport.

Standard room features include free Wi-Fi, a minibar and TV with satellite channels. Each has a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

Kalimera Mare’s restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner. Local spirits and light food are available at the main bar.

Poi.Name: Laura Hotel
Poi.Description:
Just 300 metres from Lambi beach, Laura Hotel offers accommodation with a furnished balcony. It features a traditional bar and provides free Wi-Fi in public areas.

All the rooms at Laura Hotel are fitted with simple wooden furniture and come with a fan. The private bathroom includes complimentary toiletries and a shower.

Each morning a continental breakfast is prepared and served in the breakfast area. Refreshing drinks and various beverages are available at the hotel bar.

The lively port of Kos is 1700 metres from Hotel Laura. Kos Airport is at a distance of 23 km. Private parking is available near the premises at no extra charge

Poi.Name: Sandy Beach
Poi.Description:
Set amidst tropical gardens, just 50 metres from Marmari Beach, the 4-star Sandy Beach features a freshwater swimming pool, a poolside bar and a restaurant. Facilities also include an open-air theatre, a fitness centre and a lounge room with satellite TV. 

The modern, air-conditioned rooms and suites of Sandy open to a balcony overlooking the garden, the pool or the Aegean Sea. Each comes with a satellite TV with a music channel and a fridge. Bathrooms include a hairdryer and luxurious bathtub. 

Guests can enjoy an early or late breakfast buffet, while Sunday breakfast includes sparkling wine and crepes. Greek and Mediterranean dishes are served at the 3 restaurants. There is also a cocktail bar and 2 snack bars around the swimming pools. 

 Guests can participate in aerobic sessions or animation games. Sports enthusiast will enjoy football, tennis and volleyball all free of charge. Water sports are available on the beach.​​​​

Poi.Name: Leonidas Hotel & Studios
Poi.Description:
Situated 900 metres from Kos centre, Leonidas Hotel & Studios features a pool and rooms with balcony. It offers free Wi-Fi access in the reception area and free private on-site parking.

Leonidas rooms are bright and airy, and come with air conditioning, fridge and TV. Safes can be provided at an extra charge.

Guests can relax at the free sun beds by the swimming pool or enjoy a cocktail at the hotel’s pool bar. There is also a separate pool for the children.

Within 400 metres, guests can reach a bus station connecting to the rest of Kos island. The nearest beach is 800 metres away.

Poi.Name: Evripidis Village
Poi.Description: The hotel is family operated and is built on 22.000 square meters. It includes five buildings, surrounded by beautiful gardens. It consists of 48 standard two bedded rooms, 18 deluxe rooms (two bedded and three bedded), and 39 two room suites, all beautifully furnished. They also boast large verandas, which offer stunning views of the sea and surrounding mountains. All rooms are air conditioned, with refrigerators and hairdryers.​

Poi.Name: Marmari Beach
Poi.Description:
Set in 60,000-m² gardens with Aegean Sea views, 4-star Marmari Beach Hotel features a private beach, 3 swimming pools and tennis courts. It offers breakfast and dinner.

Each air-conditioned room is elegantly decorated with blue accents and tiled floors. All units include a satellite TV and radio.

Guests can have drinks at one of the 3 pool bars, or at the beach bar. The restaurant serves Mediterranean and international dishes. Everyday there is a rich salad bar.

Hotel Marmari Beach has 3 children’s’ pools, a playground and a kids club that organizes fun activities.

Massages and facials are offered at the spa and there is also a well-equipped gym with sauna. Windsurfing facilities and experienced trainers are available.

Marmari village has shops within a 5-minute walk. Kos International Airport is at 10 km.

Poi.Name: Smaragdi Hotel
Poi.Description:
SMARAGDI Hotel is a complex of rooms in Lambi of Kos. This modern, two-storey building extends in a large area in order to make your stay here more pleasant and comfortable. The hotel is surrounded by palm trees and grass, while the outdoor swimming pool is an oasis of coolness during the hot summer days.

The hotel's interior spaces are bright and spacious, offering many facilities and services to all guests.
The hotel lies in a privileged location, just 1. Km from Kos Town, while 750 meters from here is the beach, where you can relax and enjoy your swim. There are many shops and restaurant in the surrounding area.

Poi.Name: Carda Garden Village
Poi.Description:
Each stylish room at the Carda Beach offers comfortable beds, a DVD player and a luxurious bathroom with hairdryer. All rooms have private balconies with views of the sea or the garden.

Mediteranneo Restaurant is located right on the pool’s edge. It serves American breakfast, lunch and dinner buffet inspired by Greek and International cuisine. The Asian Wok n' roll restaurant offers eastern flavours along with views of the swimming pool.

Carda Spa provides a full range of revitalising services, including saunas, hamams (Turkish bath), hot tub and a tranquil relaxation lounge with heated armchairs.

Poi.Name: Caravia Beach
Poi.Description:
Enjoying a seaside location in Marmari, Caravia Beach Hotel offers 2 large swimming pools and a host of leisure and entertainment options, just 15 minutes’ drive from Kos Town.

Caravia Beach Hotel offers a relaxing environment of lush gardens, exotic palm trees and the beautiful, sandy beach. The rooms are well-furnished and appointed with a range of home comforts, including air conditioning and modern, en suite facilities. Enjoy picturesque views of Caravia’s gardens and pools or the nearby sea.

After your complimentary breakfast, relax in and around the pools as children play in their playground. Challenge friends and family to a game of football, tennis or volleyball. Take a short stroll to Marmari Beach and splash around in the sea or join in with the various water sports available.

There are plenty of restaurants and bars nearby and Caravia Beach Hotel also offers a sophisticated cocktail lounge for evening entertainment. You can savour delicious Greek and international specialities in Caravia’s full-service restaurant. Later on, dance the night away at Cavaria’s disco and try the popular Greek dance, the syrtaki.​

Poi.Name: Karlos Village
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kefalos.

Poi.Name: Niriides Beach Hotel
Poi.Description:
Niriides Beach Hotel is one of the best Three Star hotels on Kos island. Offering comfortable accommodation, friendly and professional staff, with very good in-house facilities, it is recommended for relaxing and enjoyable holidays.
With an attractive seafront location in Psalidi, the complex is situated just 1.6 km from the center Kos town. Accross the road a private, single beach is organized for our visitors with umbrellas, sunbeds and showers. Water-sports are available 500m away in the main Psalidi Beach. The location is ideal for visitors that want to relax in a quite hotel but also want to be close to the action, the shops, the restaurants and the clubs.

Poi.Name: Ammos Resort
Poi.Description: Ammos Resort Hotel is located in Mastichari of Kos. It is built near the sea, and it is the ideal base for excursions in the surrounding area. It also the ideal place for rest and relaxation, where you can enjoy your holidays away from the stress and the routine of the city..​

Poi.Name: Adonis Hotel
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kos.

Poi.Name: Pelagos
Poi.Description:
The elegant units at the Pelagos are equipped with air conditioning, satellite TVs and a balcony or terrace with garden or Aegean Sea and Asia Minor views. Each unit offers an open-plan living and sleeping area, and marble bathroom. Some feature well-equipped kitchenettes.

Buffet breakfast is included in the room rate and is served in the restaurant overlooking the outdoor swimming pool. Lunch and dinner include a good selection of international food. Show-cooking stations, a separate dining space for children and a stylish bar where guests can enjoy drinks, are also provided.

Younger guests can enjoy the 3 children's pools and the animation activities by specialized staff. A fitness centre, hot tubs and saunas are among the many wellness options provided on site.

The Pelagos is ideally located for those looking for a quieter environment, but with a lively resort environment within easy reach

​

Poi.Name: Tingaki Beach
Poi.Description:
Situated 100 metres from the beach of Tigkaki in Kos, this 4-star hotel offers 2 swimming pools and tennis court. It features air-conditioned rooms with views of the well-tended garden, the pool or side views of the Aegean Sea.

An LCD satellite TV and fridge are included in all the air-conditioned rooms at the Tigkaki Beach Hotel. Each has a private bathroom with bathtub and hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast and dinner are served at the main restaurant. Lunch is served at the snack bar or at the beach tavern.

Leisure options include table tennis and billiards facilities. Younger guests can enjoy the 2 children’s pools. Hydromassage jets are provided in one of the main pools.

The centre of Tigkaki is 300 metres away. Kos Town is at 12 km and Kos International Airport is 15 km away. Staff can arrange car rental and free private parking is provided on site.

Poi.Name: Afentoulis Hotel
Poi.Description:
​Located on a tranquil, tree-lined street just off the beach road on the eastern part of town, Afendoulis Hotel is perfect for families as well as the more discerning back-packing traveller.

The hotel has 23 rooms, accessed by elevator and all are equipped with private shower, telephone, refrigerator, air-conditioning and fans. Most rooms also have a balcony, with several offering a delightful sea-view. Two family studios are also available.
The jasmin scented garden, canopied by bougainvilla, offers a cool and relaxing oasis where you can breakfast or wind down after a day's sun and fun.

Poi.Name: Afroditi Hotel
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kos.

Poi.Name: Aktaion Hotel
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kos.

Poi.Name: Apollon
Poi.Description:
Hotel Apollon is a 4 star hotel, ideally situated, a mere 1km from the centre of Kos Town in the area of Lambi and only a short 200-metre walk from the beautiful beach of Nea Alikarnassos.

It features a large outdoor pool, pool snack-bar and children's playground. Guests can also enjoy free access to the on-site tennis court and billiards.

Rooms are comfortable and spacious and kept in flawless condition. Each is well equipped and has private balcony and bathroom.

The attentive staff at Apollon Hotel are always available to assist guests. If you feel like exploring the island, car, motorcycle or bike rental can be arranged. Free Wi-Fi access is available at the hotel's lobby.

​

Poi.Name: Aleka Apartments
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kos.

Poi.Name: Alexandra Apartments
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kos.

Poi.Name: Aliki Hotel
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kos.

Poi.Name: Americana Hotel
Poi.Description:
​Hotel Americana is a popular small hotel in the centre of Kos Town, in Kos Island, that is the favorite choice of guests who would like to enjoy good value quality holidays in a friendly environment. Americana Hotel has recently been refurbished and is now proudly offering hospitality services of international standards with attention to detail. The Americana Hotel is now equipped with a new technology customer elevator, provides air conditioning as a standard feature in all rooms, and has adopted a more environmental friendly approach with a decrease in the use of electric power and water and an increase in the use of solar energy.

The only thing that will not change at the Americana Hotel Kos is the warmth of the welcome from the owner and her staff. / Open All Year Round /

Poi.Name: Anastasia Hotel
Poi.Description:
The family-run Hotel Anastasia is located on the outskirts of lively Kos Town, 10 minutes’ walk from the nearest beach. Hotel facilities include a fresh-water swimming pool.

The twin-bedded rooms are equipped with shower and WC, radio, telephone and balcony or terrace with inland view. Air conditioning is available at a charge.

Guests can relax by the sun terrace and enjoy cocktails and refreshments from the pool bar.

Anastasia Hotel is 27 km from Kos Airport. Guests will find shops, bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk. There is free parking on site.

Poi.Name: Angela Hotel
Poi.Description:
The complex Angela is a small family self-catered hotel, located in the heart of Kos Town and is committed to the Greek custom of graciousness and hospitality.

Is built in a modern architecture, is conveniently located 350 meters from the center and the harbour of Kos Island and opposite to a supermarket.

The complex, being family and couple orientated, children friendly and quiet, offers cozy accommodation to ensure an enjoyable stay.

Angela Apartments is operated since 1988 and is quiet familiar as a family hotel.

Poi.Name: Anneta Hotel
Poi.Description:
In a peaceful area of the Kos Island’s capital, this hotel is 150 metres from the beach and just 10 minutes walk from the centre of the town.

The hotel is run by a family who aim to make your stay more comfortable and enjoyable, with the new Kos Yacht marina, new Kos Stadium and basketball gym nearby. Furthermore, the hotel is surrounded by many beautiful taverns, restaurants, and supermarkets.

The reception and lobby area features a TV room and a lounge bar, with its warm atmosphere and lovely veranda overlooking the peaceful neighbourhood. At breakfast, you can enjoy a superb environment in combination with a variety of goods in our buffet.

Poi.Name: Aspa Holidays
Poi.Description: ​Comfortable and welcoming accommodation in the city center. At it's 20 rooms you will enjoy quality sleep, homemade breakfast as it is positioned at the crossroads (having everything within walking distance), you will easily discover Kos Town.

Poi.Name: Meni Beach
Poi.Description: Fully renovated in tones reminiscent of art nouveau, with a futuristic and minimal color brush, Meni hotel remains as hospitable and as steadfast to the catering of its visitors, as its olden manifestation.​

Poi.Name: Aegean Houses
Poi.Description:
Within 1 km from Kos port, Aegean Houses offers accommodation with kitchen and balcony. It has a lovely swimming pool, a jacuzzi and a sauna. Free on-site parking is available.

The apartments, studios and suites of Aegean hotel are very bright and tastefully decorated. They are fitted with a satellite TV, safe and hairdryer. The kitchen features a microwave, a fridge and a coffee maker.

The swimming pool area features free sun beds and umbrellas. The hotel also includes a well-equipped fitness room and can arrange for relaxing massage sessions.

Guests can start their day with a rich buffet breakfast. Aegean Houses restaurant serves Greek and international cuisine, while there is also a pool bar offering fresh juices and cocktails.

The 24-hour front desk can provide information about the attractions of the island. The sandy beach of Tigaki is 10 km from the hotel. Kos Airport is a 30-minute drive away.

​

Poi.Name: Sun Palace
Poi.Description:
Hotel Sun Palace lies 400m from a wonderful pebbled beach  a 4 star Hotel with bungalows complex - only 32km from the airport and 4 km from the kos center.The rooms are modernly furnished and are equipped with a private bathroom with bath, air conditioning, refrigerator, direct dial telephone, hairdryer and a balcony or terrace. The main building has a lobby, reception desk and a large sitting room with TV and Internet corner. There is an indoor and outdoor mini club for children with sitters (for children 4 years and over) and also daily and evening activities.
 The hotel was full renovated and consists of 170 rooms distributed between the 3-storey main building and smaller 2-storey buildings of bungalows​

Poi.Name: Royal Park Grecotel
Poi.Description:
Set on a beautiful sandy beach and surrounded by farmland and countryside, our all Inclusive Family Hotel In Kos exudes an air of calm and relaxation. Our family hotel in Kos offers colourful large gardens that encircle the pretty garden bungalows and main building.

Both here and on the long sandy beach there are endless quiet spots for sunbathing. For the more energetic, a long walk in the countryside or along the coast is a pleasure on this flat coastal plain.

There are plenty of sports and entertainment facilities at Grecotel Royal Park and for those who relish a lively nightlife, a short bus ride to Kos Town will fulfil your dreams.

Poi.Name: Bahamas Hotel
Poi.Description:
​The Bahamas Hotel is a family run hotel with a friendly atmosphere and ideal for couples looking for a relaxing holiday.

The Hotel has won multiple Thomson awards.

Poi.Name: Platanista
Poi.Description:
The Mediterranean-style Platanista is quietly located just 150 metres from the beach and 1 km from Kos Marina. It offers 2 large outdoor pools, spa facilities and free private parking. 

Platanista has a variety of comfortable and well-equipped accommodation with private balconies. 

Guests can enjoy a rich breakfast before relaxing around the large outdoor pools one of which has hydromassage jets. Dinner includes Greek and international cuisine. 

Children can enjoy the shallow pool, the playground and the organised activities. Guests who want to burn some energy can enjoy a game of tennis or mini-golf. After a day of activities and sightseeing, Platanista spa offers massage treatments.​

Poi.Name: Captain's Hotel
Poi.Description:
Boasting a central location in this popular island town, the Captain’s Hotel,  is just a 5-minute walk from the picturesque harbour and sandy beaches. This attractive and competitively priced property treats guests to optimum comfort in the heart of the action, close to shops, restaurants and discos and the charm of the Old Town. For those who prefer the more tranquil side of island life, there are plenty of mountain walks nearby and the opportunity to discover pretty villages and coastal strolls next to the glittering Aegean sea.

Friendly and dedicated staff are on hand to advise you as to nearby attractions, and will happily share a wealth of tourist information. The hotel is close to a regularly serviced bus stop, so local travel is easy and efficient. Unwind in the swimming pool or soak up the sunshine on the loungers, whilst contemplating your itinerary. Send emails about your travels with the use of complimentary wireless Internet access. 

There is a 24hour Front Desk service and Lounge Bar.
The hotel can also provide a safe deposit box at the front desk and luggage storage space, as well as the extra convenience of express check-in/check-out. ​

Poi.Name: Costel Hotel
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kos.

Poi.Name: Magic Life
Poi.Description:
The Club Magic Life invites guests to a wide array of entertainment options. The excellent water sports facilities include the Magic Life Surf-centre.

Settled upon an impressive 60,000 square metres garden, Club Magic Life Kos allocates the main hotel building and 20 bungalows with a total of 355 rooms.

All rooms at the Magic Life Kos are well appointed and offer balconies with beautiful views. Each features all modern comforts including hair dryer, satellite TV and mini-fridge.

Guests can enjoy complimentary meals all day at the main restaurant, Magico or alternatively dine at one of the 2 a-la carte restaurants.

The club offers 3 thematic pools, an Activity Pool, a Relax Pool and a Family Pool with an integrated children's pool and 4 tennis courts. The Mungo Club and the Meeting for Teens offer entertainment for children and teens.

Poi.Name: Dimitris Paritsa Hotel
Poi.Description:
Dimitris Paritsa is a family run hotel with a cosy and friendly atmosphere, located in the centre of Kos. Many restaurants, bars, shops and cafes surround the hotel.

All rooms are en suite and air-conditioned. Each has a balcony with mountain or sea view, direct telephone, radio and fridge.

A bar, a breakfast room and a 24 hour reception are available at the hotel. Safe deposit boxes are also available on demand.

Poi.Name: Princess Of Kos Bay
Poi.Description:
The all-inclusive Princess Hotel serves breakfast, lunch and dinner buffets at the 2 on-site restaurants. Selected beverages are also offered and can be enjoyed at the beach bar or at the 2 pool bars.

Accommodation at Princess of Kos includes rooms, apartments and studios with balcony offering views of the sea, the pools or the garden. Each includes satellite TV, fridge and air conditioning.

Built in Aegean architectural style, surrounded by beautiful gardens with palm trees and colourful flowers, the Princess of Kos offers views of the clear waters of the Aegean Sea.

Poi.Name: Catherine Hotel
Poi.Description:
Situated within a 3-minute walk from the promenade of Kos, and 40 metres from the ferry terminal, Catherine Hotel features rooms with free Wi-Fi. Restaurants, shops and bars are within 100 metres.

Each of Hotel Catherine's air-conditioned rooms has large windows or balcony with views over Kos Port and the town. Rooms include a TV and a refrigerator. All units have a private bathroom with shower.

The hotel serves a breakfast buffet each morning. Local drinks and coffee are available at the on-site bar.

Guests are within a 10-minute walk from the Castle of the Knights and Zouroudi beach is within 100 metres. Psalidi Beach is at 3 km. Staff can arrange car and bicycle rental.

Poi.Name: Kanari Beach
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kos.

Poi.Name: Dimitra Beach
Poi.Description:
Dimitra Beach is a 4-star all-inclusive resort in Agios Fokas village of Kos that offers 6 swimming pools and 2 restaurants in a beachfront setting. Enjoying views of the sea, the hotel’s premises include sports facilities, a mini market and a kids’ disco.

The air-conditioned units have wooden furnishings and bright colours and include a satellite TV and a fridge. Featuring a balcony or a terrace, each unit offers views to the sea or the garden. Some of them have a dining and a seating area and a kitchenette with kitchenware.

A rich buffet breakfast is served daily, while guests can taste Greek and Mediterranean flavours at the 2 on-site restaurants. Hotel features 4 bars, where you can enjoy a drink and a snack all day long.

Leisure facilities include a table tennis, basket and beach volley fields and a mini football. Children can spend their time at the on-site playground or at the disco, while the hotel also offers babysitting services.

Poi.Name: Elma Hotel
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kos.

Poi.Name: Zorbas
Poi.Description:
The hotel is a new, attractive and spacious unit consisting of several buildings and one main building decorated with a bright lobby and reception. It functions on all-inclusive basis.
There are double rooms and two types of family rooms which are all modernly furnished. They have telephone, satellite TV, music channel, safe (with charge), mini refrigerator, air conditioning, bath, W/C, hairdryer, balcony or terrace. Credit cards accepted: Euro/MasterCard, Visa and American express.

Poi.Name: Esperides Hotel
Poi.Description:
Within 800 metres of the centre of Kos town, the family-run Esperides offers self-catering rooms and free Wi-Fi in its public areas. It has a swimming pool and a bar, and provides free on-site parking.

Hotel Esperides offers bright and spacious accommodation. Each unit has a kitchenette with fridge and electric kettle. Facilities also include a TV and a private bathroom with bathtub or shower. Air conditioning and safety box are available at an extra charge.

The nearest beach is 300 metres away from the hotel, while the seaside village of Tigaki is a 15-minute drive away. Kos Airport can be reached at 22 km.

Poi.Name: Faliron Apartments
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kos.

Poi.Name: Blue Oceanic
Poi.Description: The Oceanis Beach and Spa Resort is a newly renovated 4-star plus hotel with 382 guestrooms and suites located right on the beach in Psalidi, about 4 km from the center of Kos town. Situated 28 km from the airport, the hotel is especially designed for couples, offering beautiful and romantic sceneries suitable for weddings or renewal of vows at the picturesque church on the grounds. The main pool, right in front of the sea, offers a pool bar with exotic and refreshing drinks and cocktails​.​​​

Poi.Name: Fantasia Hotel Apartments
Poi.Description:
Located within a 5 minutes' walk from Kos Port and just 150 metres from the beach, Fantasia Hotel Apartments offers a bar and rooms with kitchenette and a satellite TV. Free Wi-Fi is available in the entire hotel.

Simply furnished, Fantasia rooms are air conditioned and have a private balcony with city views. In-room facilities include a coffee machine, a fridge and a private bathroom with shower. A dining area is included.

Guests can enjoy a drink or light meal at the café located on the ground floor.

The seaside town of Tigaki, featuring a popular sandy beach, is a 15-minute drive from the hotel. Guests will find restaurants, bars and shops within 100 metres, while Kos Airport is at 21 km. Public parking is available nearby free of charge.

Poi.Name: Pelopas Resort
Poi.Description:
​The Pelopas Resort accommodations are spacious with their own private balconies, offering a kitchen with microwave oven, a coffee maker and a toaster. A satellite TV with DVD player is included. Wi-Fi access is available throughout the property, and charges apply.

The complex has a swimming pool with a separate children’s pool, a sun terrace with comfortable sun beds and umbrellas, all free of charge. Other facilities include a children’s playground and a sauna.

Various travel agencies, shops, bars, taverns and café are scattered around the surrounding area. Sun beds, umbrellas and water sports are available on the beach.

The Pelopas Resort is 12km from Kos Town and well-connected by public bus service. The bus stop is right outside of the hotel.

Poi.Name: Galaxy Hotel
Poi.Description:
Situated just a 10-minute walk from the centre of Kos Town, Galaxy Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and a private balcony. It has a snack bar with a large satellite TV and serves continental breakfast.

Galaxy rooms are bright and simply furnished and enjoy views over the town of Kos. They come with a satellite TV, as well as a mini fridge, electric kettle and coffee maker. Each room also has a private bathroom equipped with hairdryer.

The port of Kos is 1.5 km away. At 150 metres, guests can reach the nearest beach, as well as the marina of Kos. Free parking can be found near the premises.

Poi.Name: Archipelago Hotel
Poi.Description:
ARCHIPELAGO, an B class complex, is always ready to make your holidays in Kos unforgettable.
The complex offers accommodation in one of It's 112 modern rooms (single, double, triple).all with bathroom, air-conditioning, telephone and radio. 
  All rooms have a balcony or a veranda and the choice of view it's absolutely a matter of your preference.
Those of you who adore the sea may choose one of the 87 rooms overlooking the Asian coast and those who prefer complete serenity, one of the 25 rooms with a view to the hills.

Poi.Name: Hellas Hotel
Poi.Description:
Situated in the centre of Kos Town, the family-run Hotel Hellas features comfortably furnished rooms with balcony. It is 500 metres from the beach, and 400 metres from Kos port.

Each of the Hellas guest rooms has a fridge and TV. Guests also have access to the communal terrace, and the TV corner next to the reception.

Hotel Hellas guests can enjoy a Continental breakfast buffet served at the communal terrace. The Hotel offers a 24-hour reception service where safe deposit boxes are available if required.

Poi.Name: Kos Palace
Poi.Description:
Situated by the seashore, Kos Palace is 1.5 km from Tigaki village. It features an outdoor pool surrounded by sun loungers and umbrellas.
The accommodation opens out onto a balcony with unlimited Aegean Sea views.

Fitted with modern wood furnishings, the spacious rooms have air conditioning, satellite TV, fridge and safety deposit box. They include a seating area and a marble bathroom with a hairdryer.

Each morning, a buffet breakfast is prepared. Kos Palace offers a snack bar, located just steps away from the beach. The on-site restaurant serves a large variety of Greek dishes.

Massage treatments can be arranged at the in-house spa. There is a playground and paddling pool for the younger guests. Wired internet connection is available upon request with surcharge.

Kos Palace is 12 km from the town of Kos. Airport Hippocrates is at a distance of 17 km from the property. A bus stop is located in front of the hotel and free private parking is accessible on the premises.

Poi.Name: Imperial Hotel
Poi.Description:
This family-run hotel is close to the port of vibrant Kos Town, and only 200 metres from the beach. It offers a pool with pool-side bar and children’s pool.

Imperial rooms feature a private balcony, minibar and private shower. Apartments with kitchenette accommodating up to 5 persons are also available. Some rooms enjoy flat-screen TVs and Wi-Fi.

The hotel’s reception is open 24 hours a day, providing car/bike rental, exchange and internet services. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas of the hotel.

There are plenty of shops, supermarkets, tavernas, restaurants, coffee shops and bars within walking distance.

Poi.Name: Aegean View
Poi.Description:
Aegean View Aqua Resort is a gorgeous hotel at the cosmopolitan island of Kos that offers high quality hospitality services in a relaxing environment that radiates the charm of the Mediterranean. Designed with attention to detail, built with the finest materials and respect to the natural environment, Aegean View Aqua Resort is the ideal place to enjoy memorable summer holidays.

Aegean View Aqua Resort is p​roud to present its new water park with many different pools, water slides and water falls, and a Spa center.​

Poi.Name: International Hotel
Poi.Description:
​This friendly family run hotel is conveniently located overlooking the fashionable new Kos Marina. It is within a short and pleasant stroll from the center of Kos Town, along a picturesque tree lined promenade, providing it's guests with easy access to everything the town has to offer.

The International Hotel is ideally situated in a prime location with a nice beach and a variety of tavernas, cafés, shops and mini markets nearby.

Poi.Name: Caravel Hotel
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kos.

Poi.Name: Karis Hotel
Poi.Description:
The family-run Karis Hotel is located in Kos Town, within 400 metres from the pebbled beach and just a short walk from restaurants and shops. Its air-conditioned accommodation opens out to a private balcony overlooking the fragrant garden.

Simply decorated, the rooms of Karis have a fridge and a TV. Each bright and airy unit includes a private bathroom with shower and a hairdryer.

Karis Hotel is situated 250 metres from Kos Port and within 22 km from Hippocrates International Airport. The long, sandy beach of Tigaki is at 11 km, while Mastichari Village with its white sandy beach is 27 km away. Free public parking can be found nearby.

Poi.Name: Koala Hotel
Poi.Description:
Welcome to the Koala Hotel and the Patakos Family in Kos, the island of Hippocrates, father of medicine.

Friendly, hospitable, family run Hotel, located near Kos town center, just enough to be quiet at night, but near enough to explore the town.

The family with the support of the extremely service minded staff will make your stay as comfortable and enjoyable as possible. The tone of “nothing is too much trouble” pervades the place.

At the Koala Hotel they don’t just welcome you to their Hotel – they welcome you to the Family!

Poi.Name: Koni Hotel
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kos.

Poi.Name: Konstantina Hotel
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kos.

Poi.Name: Kontia Beach
Poi.Description: ​The Kontia Beach hotel is in near Kos Marina and city center. It offers swimming pool and comfortable rooms.

Poi.Name: Kos Bay Hotel
Poi.Description:
The beachfront Kos Bay Hotel is right in the centre of Kos Town and across the new Marina, just a 10-minute walk from the port. It offers a lounge bar with satellite wide-screen TV and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-fi and private balcony overlooking the Aegean Sea or the mountains.

Bright and airy, the rooms of Kos Bay feature tiled floors and are simply decorated with wooden furnishings. Each unit has direct dial telephone and a satellite TV. Air conditioning, electric kettle and fridge are standard.

Continental breakfast is served each day in buffet style. Later through the day, the lounge bar serves alcoholic drinks and refreshing beverages.

On the ground floor there is a 24-hour reception with safety boxes available for rental. Car and bike rentals can be arranged by the staff. Taxi service is provided on request.

The awarded with a blue flag Kos Marina beach is easily reached at 100 metres. Kos Bay Hotel is conveniently situated 20 metres from the bus stop. Restaurants, bars, shops and mini markets are a 2-minute walk away. Kos port is 500 metres from the hotel.

Poi.Name: Kos Sun Rise Hotel
Poi.Description:
​The hotel consists of two complexes connected with the large leisure pool.
  There are many activities, as the hotel combines the city and the sea, situated within walking distance from both.
  On-site internet, billiard and pool if you do not choose the sea.
The hotel offers a wide range of food, both for breakfast and for lunch.There is also a pool bar and a main bar with TV.
The well-landscaped and the refined atmosphere of the areas of the hotel combined with the friendly and highly professional personnel are the key strengths that make your stay a pleasant experience and a guarantee for those who seek quality and high level of service at affordable prices.

Poi.Name: Marie Hotel
Poi.Description: ​​Hotel Marie is a family runnning hotel at the center of Kos Town. Only 300m from the harbour and 600m from the city shopping center. Suitable for families or couples. It is open all year. Hotel marie is always your start up place for any of your Daily excursions in Kos Town or the rest of the island.

Poi.Name: Maritina Hotel
Poi.Description:
Located in the centre of Kos Town, Maritina Hotel offers comfortable accommodation close to the island's attractions such as Kos Castle.

The ideal base for visiting the Dodecanese Islands or neighbouring Turkey, the fully refurbished Maritina Hotel welcomes guests looking to experience genuine Greek hospitality.

Watch the world go by from the comfort of your room or check your mails using the free wireless internet access available throughout Maritina.

The restaurant serves delicious meals in a stylish atmosphere. Treat yourself to a drink at the bar or venture out to one of the bars in town.

Poi.Name: Achilleas Hotel
Poi.Description:
Just 50 metres from the beach, Achilleas Hotel is located 200 metres from the centre of Kos Town. It features a bar, free Wi-Fi and accommodation overlooking the Aegean Sea from its balcony.

A kitchenette with fridge and electric oven is standard in all the studios and apartments at Achilleas. Each has air conditioning, a safe, small dining table and TV. Complimentary toiletries and a shower can be found in the bathroom.

A variety of restaurants and shops are within a short walking distance from Achilleas Hotel. It is 23 km from Kos Airport. A bus stop and taxi stand are 100 metres from the property.

Poi.Name: Olympia Hotel
Poi.Description:
Olympia Hotel is centrally located in Kos Town, 100 metres from the main square filled with shops. It features air-conditioned rooms, a bar and free Wi-Fi in public areas. A 5-minute walk will lead you to the main port, café-bars and the nearest beach.

Simply decorated, all rooms are spacious and open out to a private balcony. Each includes a TV, fridge, telephone and en-suite bathroom with shower.

The 24-hour front desk at Olympia Hotel can arrange a car rental to explore the island. Several beach bars can be found at 150 metres. Kos Airport is 20 km away, while free public parking is available on site. Various archeological sites are within a 10-minute walk.

Poi.Name: Paradise Hotel
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kos.

Poi.Name: Paritsa Hotel
Poi.Description:
Paritsa is a family run hotel with a cozy and friendly atmosphere. The hotel is in an ideal location in Kos Town within easy reach of all shops, taverns, bars and cafes (only 200m away from the central harbour of kos).

Within the hotel, guests may make use of the breakfast room, relax with a book in the lounge area or have a refreshing drink at the hotel's bar. Paritsa Hotel is ideal for those who want to relax during their holidays. The sandy and shingle beach is 5 - 10 minutes walk away.

Poi.Name: Silver Beach
Poi.Description:
The hotel "SILVER BEACH" located in Kardamena Kos. Kardamena is in the southern part of the island and has one of the nicest
Beaches. The hotel overlooks the sea and is just 100m from the square.
Recently renovated, provides the necessary services, offers 110 beds with air-condition, TV and fridge.

Poi.Name: Kris Mari Hotels
Poi.Description:
Only 200 metres from Kardamena Beach, Kris Mari has an outdoor pool with sun beds and a poolside snack bar. A continental breakfast in buffet style is served daily, next to the inside bar.

Featuring large, floor-to-ceiling windows, all rooms open to a balcony with pool, Aegean Sea or mountain views. Each includes a TV with satellite channels and fridge. A hairdryer is provided in the private bathroom.

Entertainment options at Kris Mari include table tennis, a games room and billiards. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. The 24-hour staff can arrange car or bicycle rental to explore the island.​​

Poi.Name: Ramira Beach
Poi.Description:
Mitsis Ramira is located along its private stretch of sandy beach on Psalidi, only 3.5 km from Kos Town.

The contemporary rooms are air conditioned, with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, mini fridge and balcony or terrace with outdoor furniture. Guests enjoy free use of the well-stocked minibar.

American buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner are served at the main restaurant. Special theme nights include Greek, Chinese and Italian. A Chinese restaurant, Italian restaurant and 4 bars are also available.

With a water sports centre, the Ramira also features a mini soccer court, multipurpose court and tennis court. Young guests will enjoy the children’s pool, playground or games room. The animation team organizes games, shows and competitions.

Mitsis Ramira is 27 km from Kos Airport and there is a bus stop in front of the hotel. Private parking is available on site.

​

Poi.Name: Cleopatra Superior
Poi.Description:
Situated near the beach of Kardamena, Cleopatra Superior is a 3-star hotel including a swimming pool with a large sun terrace, 2 bars and a fitness room. Its rooms open out to a private balcony.

Cleopatra rooms are simply furnished and have en-suite bathroom with hairdryer. They are also equipped with a satellite TV, mini fridge and safety box.

Guests can enjoy refreshing drinks, fresh juices and coffees at the lobby bar of the hotel, while light meals are served at the poolside snack bar. Continental breakfast is prepared daily.

Poi.Name: Polina
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kos.

Poi.Name: Oscar
Poi.Description:
The fully air-conditioned Oscar Hotel is centrally situated in Kos Town, only 200 metres from the port. The most popular beach with water sports is walking distance.

The Oscar Hotel offers a total of 193 rooms, all with sea-view balconies. Each is comfortably equipped with air conditioning, tea/coffee making facilities and TV.

At the hotel’s swimming pool guests can enjoy complimentary sun beds and a pool bar/tavern. Children can swim safely in their own pool. The welcoming lounge area offers a TV room.

The hotel features a restaurant and a traditional tavern which serves grills and local recipes. Drinks and coffee are available at the bar and the pool bar.

The Oscar Hotel offers public Wi-Fi, bicycle and car rental services. The public bus connecting to Kos Town and the airport stops right outside the hotel.​​

Poi.Name: Continental Palace
Poi.Description:
​A simple environment for the visitors.
Just opposite of the Marine for those who would like also to cruise at Aegean islands...
The first class hotel is situated only 50 m. from the beach and 1,5 min. from the town of historical and wonderful island of Kos.

Frequent local bus service available. The reception lounges and bar area are spacious surrounded by large verandas and beautiful gardens.

Poi.Name: Gallia
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kos.

Poi.Name: Pavlos Hotel
Poi.Description:
Pavlos Hotel is located just 300 m. from the sandy beach, 500 m. from the centre and port of Kos. It offers a 200 square-metre swimming pool and a separate one for children.

All the 32 apartments of Hotel Pavlos are constructed in a higher standard and offer a private balcony, kitchen with fridge and microwave oven, modern furniture, air conditioning, satellite TV and three music programs.

The ground floor of Pavlos Hotel features a 24-hour reception, and comfortable lounge with bar and TV room. In the swimming pool area there is a snack bar.

Poi.Name: Aristo
Poi.Description:
This apartment complex is ideally located in the village centre.
The property has a TV room, a swimming pool and a safe. In fine weather, an outdoor terrace provides an ideal spot to relax.
Apartments at the Aristo Apartments are well-appointed and provide all the essential amenities including a refrigerator and a kitchenette. For guests who wish to cook their own meals, every apartment is furnished with a stove.
Kos Island International Airport (KGS) is under a 40-minute drive from the Aristo Apartments. The Asklepion, Amphitheatre and Port of Kos are under 20 minutes away by car.​

Poi.Name: Poseidon Hotel
Poi.Description:
Poseidon Hotel is 800 metres from Kos Town, and 200 metres from the closest beach and the promenade. Offering free Wi-Fi in its public areas, the hotel features an outdoor pool and air-conditioned rooms with large balcony.

Rooms have a TV with local and satellite channels, safe and facilities for tea and coffee making, and there is a hairdryer in the bathroom. Some rooms have views over the pool.

The outdoor pool is equipped with sun beds and umbrellas. Guests can enjoy refreshing drinks and cold snacks at the on site pool bar.

Wired internet access is provided at the hotel’s computer room at a charge. Free public parking is available around the hotel.

Poi.Name: Atlanta Apartments
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kos.

Poi.Name: Santa Marina Hotel
Poi.Description:
Enjoying a quiet location in the town of Kos, Santa Marina Hotel displays a live cosmopolitan atmosphere combined with traditional warm hospitality.

The hotel’s strategic position, only a 5-minute walk from the centre and a 10-minute walk to the beaches, make Santa Marina the ideal starting point for holidays in Kos.

The hotel offers 59 self-catered studios and apartments all equipped with modern installations such as air conditioning and TV. Each unit offers balcony.

The hotel offers excellent facilities, including a bar and an outdoor swimming pool with free sun beds and umbrellas.

Poi.Name: Alexandra Beach
Poi.Description:
​Relaxing facilities, good food and 106 guestrooms, studios and apartments combine with warm hospitality and excellent service to make this an ideal base from which to explore all this area has to offer.
For an outstanding getaway in sunny Kos, the Alexandra Beach Hotel & Apartments is a place where lovely memories can be made!

Poi.Name: Semiramis Hotel
Poi.Description: Hotel at the center of Kos.​

Poi.Name: Agela Hotel & Apartments
Poi.Description:
​The hotel is recently renovated and consists of 43 apartments. Located only 100 meters from a sandy beach and next to the marina of Kos and the center of Kos town, hotel Agela , B' Class (3 stars) is open from 15 of April to 15 of October.

The hotel facilities include a swimming pool, a children’s swimming pool, a playground and a snack bar while each apartment is equiped with everything you might need for your relaxing vacation in the island of Kos​.

Poi.Name: Soleil Apartments
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kos.

Poi.Name: Sunny View
Poi.Description:
​Set in open countryside, a stone’s throw away from the beach, this family-run hotel occupies a tranquil position, just 2.4 km from the centre of the lively centre of Kardamena.

Located on the south coast off the island of Kos, which is part of the Dodecanese (12 islands), Kardamena is a small village surrounded by the Aegean Sea. It provides a range of restaurants, bars and shops to please every taste and preference.

At Sunny View you can unwind, relax and forget all your troubles in a carefree environment. A refreshing alternative to larger chain hotels, the hotel provides a personal and relaxed service, complemented by family warmth, cleanliness and friendly staff.

Poi.Name: St. George Apartments
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kos.

Poi.Name: Thalassa Hotel
Poi.Description:
​Thalassa Hotel offers unrivalled facilities to its guests. Satisfying a wide variety of personal choices for every taste, Thalassa Hotel is a famous and distinguished resort every summer.

Guests can choose between the outdoor swimming pool and the beautiful sandy beach. Relax and soak up the sun while you watch your little ones splash around the kids pool and make new friends at our playground.

For the more active, a selection of activities is available at Thalassa Hotel. Whether your vacation dream is active or more relaxed, Thalassa Hotel includes temptations for any interest!

Poi.Name: Rio
Poi.Description:
​Just 100 metres from Kardamena Beach in Kos, only 50 metres from the port, Rio Hotel features a snack bar. It offers air-conditioned studios with a balcony overlooking the town.

A kitchenette with a microwave oven, fridge and electric kettle is included in all studios at the Hotel Rio. Each has a TV, a safety box and a private bathroom with shower.

Guests have access to billiards facilities. Free Wi-Fi is provided in public areas.

Shops and restaurants are within a 2-mniute walk. Staff can arrange car rental to explore Kos Town 28 km away.

Poi.Name: Theonia Hotel
Poi.Description:
Theonia hotel welcomes you in the island of medicine, the island of Kos. The hotel is located in the north-western department of the island, 500 meters only, away from the harbor and the center of the city, and it offers you a quiet and friendly environment for your vacation.

The reception is in your disposal 24-hours a day as your comfort is our priority. Refresh in our swimming-pool or have a refreshing cocktail from our bar as enjoying the splendid days of the summertime. The rooms, comfortable, spotless and completely equipped make you feel relaxed after an intense day in the island of Kos and the enchanting beaches.

Don’t be anxious about your morning awakening. Simply inform the rception for the awakening hour and just leave it to them! You can simply enjoy the morning delicacies in the breakfast room. The staff, all polite, friendly and smiling, is always at the client's disposal.

Poi.Name: Dimitrios Hotel
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kos.

Poi.Name: Kalimera Kos
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kos.

Poi.Name: Thomas Hotel
Poi.Description:
Thomas family hotel is located at Kos town next to the "sand and pebbles" beach in a distance of about 1 km from the historical Centre, the Old Town, Kos port and Hippocrates tree at Dodecanese.

Enjoy your holiday in the cleanest and most peaceful neighborhood of the town, receiving the best service and hospitality offered by Thomas family.

Relax in the hotel's rooms provided with air - conditioning, fridge, television and balcony with a breathtaking view of the artificial harbour.

Explore the beauties of the island hiring a car or a motorbike. You can even swim in the natural spa which is 10 km away from the hotel.

Poi.Name: Hermes
Poi.Description:
​Just 650 metres from the beach, Hermes is a family-run hotel located on the hillside of Kefalos overlooking the Aegean Sea.

Hermes Hotel provides a comfortable lounge with satellite TV and a designated smoking area. Guests have at their disposal courts for table tennis, tennis and billiards. BBQ facilities are also available.

The breakfast is served daily at the restaurant. Guests can also order refreshing drinks at the pool bar or at the snack bar. Many taverns and bars can be found at Kefalos village.

The hotel is situated around 15 km from Kos Airport and 40 km from the port. Free parking is available on site.

Poi.Name: Appellis
Poi.Description: ​Apellis is a family run hotel just 2 km outside Kos Town. It is situated in the area of Lambi beach, which lies across the headland to the west of the town.The beach is accessible with bus, cycling or even walking.​

Poi.Name: Veroniki Hotel
Poi.Description:
Located 100 metres from the beach of Kos Town and just 200 metres from the port, Veroniki Hotel features air-conditioned rooms with views to the Aegean Sea. Bars and restaurants are within a 2-minute walk.

A TV and fridge are included in all rooms at the Veroniki. Each has a private bathroom with shower.

Kos Airport is 25 km away. A bus to several beaches stops 10 metres away. Staff can arrange car rental. Free Wi-Fi is provided in public areas.

​

Poi.Name: Virginia Hotel
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kos.

Poi.Name: St. Constantine
Poi.Description:
​Saint Constantin Hotel is a 3*** star Kos Town hotel of 104 rooms in the city of Kos, Kos Island, Greece.

It is located in the heart of Kos town and only 100 m. from a beautiful sandy beach.
Every room has beautiful furniture and large beds, bath or shower, air conditioning, sattelite T.V., refridgerator, telephone, hair-dryer, in-room music and large balcony.  
In the studios and apartments (except the above) there are fully equipped kitchenettes with a table and chairs and  there is also an extra bed or a bed-sofa.

Saint Constantin Kos Town Hotel is

  • 300 m. from the harbour.
  • 25 km from Hippocrates Kos Airport (25 min.drive)
  • A few minutes walk to restaurants, tavernas, night clubs/bars, super markets, shopping etc.

Poi.Name: Yiorgos Hotel
Poi.Description:
Only 50 metres from the beach and the marina, the family run hotel Yiorgos is situated in a quiet area in Kos Town. The port and the centre are a 10-minute walk.

The friendly hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with TV, telephone, as well as refrigerator and coffee maker. All rooms have private balconies.

At the ground floor, guests will find the bar and the breakfast room. Yiorgos guests can use the swimming pool next to the hotel.

The hotel’s reception is available 24/7 and offers exchange service, as well as tourist information and car/motorbike rental. Guests can also benefit from the free internet access available at the hotel’s communal areas.

In the area surrounding the hotel, guests will find numerous taverns, restaurants and markets, while the nearest bus stops just 100 metres away.

Poi.Name: Pyli Bay
Poi.Description:
Just 300 metres from the sandy beach of Marmari, in Kos, Pyli Bay features a restaurant and a tennis court. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a furnished balcony overlooking the swimming pool or the garden.

Featuring earthy tones, rooms at the Pyli Bay come with a satellite TV and fridge. Each has a private bathroom with hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner including Greek and international dishes are served at the restaurant. Light meals, ice creams, coffee and drinks are provided at the snack bar.

A gym, a ping pong table and a volleyball court are among the many fitness options available. Younger guests can enjoy themselves at the on-site playground and children’s pool.

Staff at the 24-hour front desk can arrange car rental to explore Kos Town 6 km away. The sandy Tigaki Beach is within 4 km. Hippocrates International Airport is at 15 km. Free, private parking is possible on site.​

Poi.Name: Zephyros Hotel
Poi.Description:
​In the town of Kos, 50 m from the seaside (pebble beach), facing the new Marina of Kos. A nice 3 star hotel, 50 rooms, half of them facing the sea, with refrigator, air condition, TV, telephone, bathroom (shower), hairdryer and balcony.
Spacious Reception area, Bar with satelite TV, Breakfast Room, Snack Bar by the swimming pool at the back side of the hotel and wifi.

Poi.Name: Zikas Hotel
Poi.Description:
Only 600 metres from the port and 150 metres from the beach, Zikas Hotel offers simply furnished rooms with air conditioning. Reception is available 24 hours a day. There is free Wi-Fi access available in the lobby area.

The elevator-accessed rooms at Hotel Zikas have large windows allowing plenty of sunlight. Each is equipped with a mini fridge, a TV and has private bathroom facilities. Safes are available through reception.

A Continental breakfast is served daily at the hotel. Drinks and coffees can be enjoyed at the bar. Guests at the Hotel Zikas enjoy easy and quick access to the centre, and its variety of taverns and restaurants.

Poi.Name: Nina Beach
Poi.Description:
​Nina hotel is surrounded by stunning gardens and tropical trees, while in its center there is the Greek-Orthodox church of Saint Xenia.

The hotel is situated on the island of Kos in Greece, adjacent to Marmari beach which is rated as the best sandy beach of the southern Aegean Sea.
The modern facilities of the hotel are surrounded by exotic gardens with tropical trees and beautiful flowers.

Poi.Name: Philoxenia
Poi.Description:
​Situated 400 metres from the beach in Kos Town, Philoxenia Hotel offers self-catered rooms with a balcony overlooking the Aegean Sea.

Apartments at the Philoxenia offer a kitchenette with a fridge and cooking hobs. A dining area is included. Each unit has a private bathroom with shower.

The hotel is located 700 metres from the town centre with bars and restaurants. A supermarket and a bus stop are within 80 metres from the apartments. Staff at the tour desk can offer information on scenic beaches such as Thermes at 12 km. Kos International Airport is 25 km away.

Poi.Name: Giakalis Aparthotel
Poi.Description:
​Set amongst spectacular gardens, the Giakalis Hotel is a modern, 3-storey property. The outdoor swimming pool is next to a smaller sweet-water pool for children.

The tasteful guestrooms at the Giakalis Hotel are characterised by simple, modern décor. All incorporate kitchenettes with refrigerators and private balconies. Amenities include satellite television, and direct-dial phones. Air conditioning is available upon request at an extra charge.

Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Further amenities include express check- in/out, multilingual staff, and a safe-deposit box at the front desk.

The Giakalis Hotel houses a modern restaurant serving Greek and Mediterranean dishes. Drinks, cocktails and refreshments are available at the poolside bar.

Tigkaki village with shops and tavernas is at 2 km, and the centre of Marmari is at 1.5 km. Kos Town is 13 km from the hotel, and Kos Airport is 9 km away.​

Poi.Name: Anthoula Hotel
Poi.Description:
​The hotel is built on a hill, between Kefalos and the beach of Kamari. It is about 500 meters from the sea and offers panoramic views of the beach.
There are quiet rooms with sea views. Some of the rooms can accommodate families. There are two swimming pools (one for adults and one for children), where you can relax with a drink or coffee in the bar's pool while your children play safely in the playground.
The beach of Kamari, one of the most beautiful beaches of Kos is located in Kefalos. There is a bus with 5 routes from our hotel in Kamari beach and vice versa. You can also plan day trips to the neighboring islands of Kalymnos and Nisyros.

Poi.Name: Athinoula Hotel
Poi.Description:
Hotel Athinoula is a relatively new hotel having opened its doors for the first time in 2000. Situated in a peaceful location, one road over the main one, yet with all amenities in easy walking distance, 150m from the beach, and 500m from the resort centre. A variety of bars, tavernas and restaurants all are within easy reach.
 A great choice for those looking to take things at the their own pace as the relaxing surroundings and genuinely friendly service is a way of life at the Athinoula Hotel in Greece.

Poi.Name: Eleni Hotel
Poi.Description:
Just 100 metres from Kamari Beach in Kefalos, Eleni Hotel features a pool, a sun terrace with sun loungers and a poolside snack bar. It offers free Wi-Fi in public areas and rooms with a balcony.

The simply decorated rooms of Eleni enjoy views over the pool, the mountain or the surrounding area. Each comes with a fan and a private bathroom with shower or a bath tub. Air conditioning is available upon request at an extra charge.

Guests can start their day with a continental breakfast served daily at the dining area. Coffee, drinks and light meals can also be enjoyed at the poolside bar throughout the day.

Eleni Hotel lies within a few minutes’ walk from restaurants and bars and within 2.5 km from the centre of Kefalos. Kos Town and Port is at 40 km, while Kos International Airport is 15 km away. Free private parking is possible on site.

Poi.Name: Ionikos Hotel
Poi.Description:
Enjoying a beachfront location on Kefalos Beach, popular among windsurfers , Ionikos Hotel has a free-form swimming pool with a separate children’s section. Set amidst a palm-tree garden, it offers a restaurant, bar, fitness centre and table tennis.

All soundproofed rooms open to a furnished balcony or patio with views of the pool or the green-covered surroundings. Featuring carpeted floors and simple furnishings, each includes a fridge, and a private bathroom with shower.

A continental breakfast and Greek specialties are served at the outside, shaded restaurant. Decorated with stone and brick details, the pool-side bar prepares refreshing drinks and cocktails.

Ionikos Hotel is within a short walk from Kefalos village centre with narrow streets and whitewashed buildings. Kos International Airport is at 14 km and Kos Town at 39 km. Free parking is possible on site.

Poi.Name: Kokalakis Hotel
Poi.Description:
Situated right on Kamari beach in Kefalos, the family-run Kokalakis Hotel offers breakfast and free Wi-Fi throughout. The rooms feature a furnished balcony overlooking the pool and the small island of Saint Nicholas.

Each room at the Hotel Kokalakis is air conditioned. A fridge, safety deposit box and TV are standard. Fitted with a bathtub or shower, the private bathroom includes a hairdryer and toiletries.

There is a children’s playground for younger guests and a small library in the lounge room. Guests can have drinks and coffee at the bar or by the pool.

Shops and restaurants are located very close to the hotel. Staff at the 24-hour reception desk can arrange car rental to explore Kos Town 35 km away. Free private parking is possible on site.

Poi.Name: Cavo Doro Hotel
Poi.Description:
​A new beachfront hotel in Kos Island built in the island’s -architectural style.

Lied in a tranquil location, only a short walk from the center, with privacy, personal service and a friendly, family ambience.

An ideal resort for those seeking peace and relaxation, also for holiday-makers wishing to discover the traditional greek way of life and feel genuine warmth and hospitality.

Poi.Name: Jasmine
Poi.Description:
In the centre of Kos Town and only 300 m from the beach.
Small apartment complex in 3 floors in a central location close to restaurants, taverns and bars. The coffee shop “Jasmine” is just across the street from the complex. The apartments are equipped with bath/shower, kitchenette, fridge, A/C (payable) and balcony or terrace.

Poi.Name: Kordistos Hotel
Poi.Description:
Kordistos hotel consists of 38 comfortable rooms, with a combined bed / living room, shower / WC, A/C, hairdryer, fridge, telephone, LED TV 22'' & balcony with sea view, pool view, mountain view
and
2 suites - studios, located right on the beach, decorated in a very traditional architectural style, with bathroom, A/C, hairdryer, fridge, telephone, LED TV 26'', kitchenette facilities & balcony with straight sea view.

The hotel provides all necessary facilities & services, such as: reception, lobby, bar, satellite TV corner, WI-FI connection, greek taverna, restaurant, swimming pool, pool bar, a children's pool & playground.
Here, authentic hospitality meets the heart of the Aegean Sea and you will find a unique haven to relax and unwind.

Poi.Name: Citi Live
Poi.Description:
​This 3-star hotel is centrally located in the city of Kos. It offers free wireless internet and includes a bar and an on-site restaurant.

Citi Live Hotel has 57 rooms with a minibar and safety deposit box. A welcome drink is offered upon arrival. The bathroom includes a hairdryer.

The hotel’s central location offers easy access to the Castle of the Knights and the harbour of Kos Town, a short walk away. A number of restaurants and beautiful beaches are also nearby.

Poi.Name: Pantheon Hotel
Poi.Description: ​This modern, simply styled accommodation boasts beautiful views from its quiet hillside location, perfect for spending lazy days in the sun.

Poi.Name: Blue Jay Beach Hotel
Poi.Description: ​The Blue Jay Beach Hotel is located in a nice place, very close to the long sandy beach. Friendly service.​

Poi.Name: Sacallis Inn Hotel
Poi.Description:
Located on Kamari Bay, the beachfront Sacallis Inn Beach Hotel boasts an outdoor pool with sun beds and a restaurant and snack bar, both by the sea. Its accommodation opens outs to a terrace or balcony.

Tastefully decorated, each of the rooms and studios at Sacallis Inn offers a flat-screen satellite TV, fridge, electric kettle and hairdryer. Some units also include a kitchenette with kitchenware or have sea views. Air conditioning is available upon request with surcharge.

A Continental breakfast is served daily on the beach bar terrace, where guests can also enjoy refreshing drinks and light snacks throughout the day. The restaurant provides Greek and International cuisine and unlimited sea views. Free BBQ facilities are also accessible.

Restaurants, shops and a minimarket are within a short walking distance from Sacallis Inn Beach Hotel. The centre of Kefalos Town is at 3 km. It is 42 km from Kos Town, whereas Kos Airport is 15 km away.

Poi.Name: Astron
Poi.Description:
​The 3-star superior hotel Astron is located in the heart of the city, on the graphic harbour of Kos. It operates all year round and offers a spectacular view of the Medieval Castle.

Surrounded by exotic plants and flowers, the Astron offers a swimming pool, a 12-person hot tub and a children's pool.

Hotel Astron offers a variety of rooms and suites, all with air conditioning, satellite/cable TV and private balcony. All common areas of the hotel are fully air-conditioned.

The sandy beach is only 300 metres away, while restaurants and traditional Greek taverns and bars are only a few metres away.

Guests can taste delicious Greek and International specialties at the hotel’s restaurant, offering excellent views of the harbour. The breakfast room offers views over the harbour.

Poi.Name: Zeus Hotel
Poi.Description: ​Surrounded by trees, fields and some great mountain views, the Hotel Zeus is situated on the outskirts of Kefalos and is within strolling distance of nearby tavernas and a mini market. This bright and cheerful hotel is family run, with clean, comfortable rooms and a friendly atmosphere.

Poi.Name: Kalypso
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kos.

Poi.Name: Costa Angela
Poi.Description:
​The hotel is located 5km from the center of Kos with frequent buses and a bus stop in front of the hotel.

It has a swimming pool for adults and a smaller size for children. It is 60m from the beach and offers customers free sunbeds for any of the 2 options they prefer.

In the hotel there is a bar and a taverna. The reception offers to the customers 24 hours service. The rooms are either single or double, or triple, overlooking the garden with the swimming pool or the beach, and all have air conditioning, mini bar and hair dryer. In the garden there is a playground, a ping-pong and an amateur football field and enough space for private parking.

Poi.Name: Karantonis
Poi.Description: ​Furnished apartments, located at Mastihari and has 35 rooms and 70 beds.

Poi.Name: Filippos
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Mastihari.

Poi.Name: Artemis
Poi.Description:
Artemis beach hotel apartments is located in Lambi area (the most popular beach of the island), just 1km from the harbour and Kos town center. ​

Artemis hotel apartments were built in 1981 and totally renovated in 2001. Offers 64 comfortable apartments.

The hotel is open from April through October.

The professional and experienced staff will assist you in every way to make your holidays as pleasant as possible.

Poi.Name: Roselands
Poi.Description:
​Located 600 metres from Marmari Beach in Kos, Roseland’s Hotel covers a 16.000 m2 area with roses and palm trees.

It has a free-form pool with sun terrace, a restaurant and 2 bars.

All air-conditioned rooms open to a private balcony with Aegean Sea, mountain, pool or garden views. Featuring iron or wooden beds, they offer a 21” satellite TV, fridge and hairdryer.

Guests can enjoy buffet breakfast and dinner at the on-site restaurant. The pool-side snack bar serves refreshing drinks and light meals. Cocktail parties are organized.

A children’s pool and playground are provided for young visitors. Entertainment options include a table tennis, billiards and Greek nights. Free Wi-Fi is available in the lobby.

Roseland’s Hotel is 3 km form Tigaki Beach and 11 km from Kos International Airport. Kos Town and Port are at 14 km. Free parking is possible on site.

Poi.Name: Park Lane
Poi.Description:
​Park Lane Hotel is surrounded by beautiful tropical plants and gardens of flowers. It lies just 150 metres from sandy Tigaki beach and 12kms from Kos Town. Tigaki beach is easily accessible from the hotel by a short pebbled road.

    Hotel Facilities 
  • Buffet Breakfast
  • 24 Hour Reception Service
  • Safety Deposit Boxes
  • Lobby Bar has a spacious lounge area with satellite television and an outdoor terrace
  • You can enjoy tropical cocktails on the terrace as you watch the sun set.
  • Snack-Bar by the pool side offers a Greek and International menu.
  • Satellite television by the Lobby Bar & Snack-Bar
  • Large Swimming Pool
  • Sunbeds & Umbrellas
  • Separate Children’s Swimming Pool
  • Children’s Playground

    • Room Facilities: 
  • Air-condition
  • Direct-Dial Telephone
  • Shower or Bath/WC
  • All rooms feature a balcony or terrace
  • 3-Channel Music System
  • Sea View or Mountain View
  • Room Service
  • ​​

Poi.Name: Palladium
Poi.Description:
​Hotel Palladium is located in Marmari, a resort approximately 15km away from Kos town and Kos Airport.

Building and interior design is accredited to the owner and has set an example for many of the hotels in Kos.

It sets an example, not only because the hotel charms you with its well designed buildings and its luxury, nor because of the amount of prizes it has won, but because of its quality care and customer services and its carefully planned and detailed accommodation.

Poi.Name: Esperia
Poi.Description:
​Hotel Esperia is set in Marmari, 400 metres from the beach. The hotel is conveniently located 14km away from the city of Kos and 11km from the airport.

Set in well maintained gardens, the sunlit rooms at Esperia Hotel have spacious balconies facing the pool or the garden and are equipped with safe and air conditioning.

Sports facilities at the hotel include tennis and basketball courts, 2 swimming pools (including one for children) and a playground area.

Guests can spend relaxing moments by the pool offering a poolside bar serving snacks and drinks and a restaurant serving breakfast and dinner, or at the welcoming lounge with satellite TV.

Poi.Name: Mayflower Apartments
Poi.Description: The atmosphere at the Hotel Mayflower is very welcoming. The apartments and surroundings with swimming pool are very clean and very well maintained. The Mayflower would be a good choice to stay in Kos.

Poi.Name: Bouradanis Village
Poi.Description:
​

Family-run Bouradanis Village Hotel Apartments is just 600 metres from Marmari’s sandy beach in Kos. Features include a main pool, children’s pool and a pool bar which serves snacks. Wi-Fi is free in public areas and free sun beds are available round the pool.

Accommodation at Bouradanis Village is self catered. Each unit is soundproof. A TV, balcony and private bathroom are included.

A Continental breakfast is served each morning. Coffees, drinks and cocktails, as well as snacks and favourite Greek dishes are served at the poolside bar.

Bouradanis Village is 11 km from Kos Town and airport. Free private parking is available on site.

Poi.Name: Irina Beach
Poi.Description:
​For those in search of a truly relaxing holiday in simple, well maintained studios, Irina Beach is situated away from the resort center.

It has 22 studios and 21 apartments, outdoor swimming pool with sun terrace and loungers and mini market on site for all those self catering essentials.              

From the complex you have the stunning costal views of both the Turkish mainland and the nearby Greek Islands of Kalymnos and Pserimos The Islands airport is a 15 minute taxi ride away. Tigaki centre is 2 km away and can be walked in 20 minutes! But with a number of welcome tavernas and bars en route, you might want to take a lit​​tle longer. There is also a local bus service which serves both Tigaki the Kos Town​​.

Poi.Name: Kouros Club
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kos.

Poi.Name: Agrellis Apartments
Poi.Description:
Located in the lively Kardamena of Kos Island, just 100 metres from the beach, Agrellis Apartments features a pool with sun terrace and a snack bar. It offers a games room and self-catering accommodation with a balcony.

Enjoying views over the Aegean Sea, the pool or the mountain, the studios and apartments of Agrellis have tiled floors and wooden furnishings. Each includes a kitchenette with dining area and a private bathroom stocked with free toiletries. A fridge, cooking hobs and a telephone are available.

A continental and an English breakfast are served daily at the dining area. Guests can also enjoy a coffee, a drink and a cold snack at the snack bar by the pool. A variety of restaurants, bars and shops can be found within 500 metres from the property.

Agrellis Apartments is situated 7 km from Hippocrates International Airport and 25 km from Kos Town and Port. Staff at the front desk can help arrange car and bicycle rental to explore the island.

Poi.Name: Corali Hotel
Poi.Description:
Set amidst a well-tended garden with palm trees, Corali Hotel lies 300 metres from Tigaki Beach in Kos. It features a large pool with a separate children’s section, a mini market and tennis court.
