Featuring tiled floors, all air-conditioned rooms open to a furnished balcony with pool or garden view. Facilities include a TV with international satellite channels and fridge. Few rooms offer Aegean Sea views.

Guests at Corali can start their day with a buffet breakfast. The poolside snack bar prepares light meals, such as sandwiches, pizza and salads. A second bar operates daily, during evening hours.

Sport facilities include a fitness centre and table tennis. A playground is provided for younger guests. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas.

Corali Hotel is situated 8 km from Kos Town and 20 km from Kos International Airport. Free parking is possible on site.

Poi.Name: Ilios & Irene
Poi.Description:
​Ilios and Irene air-conditioned apartments are set in a garden of bougainvilleas and roses, 400 metres from Mastichari Beach.

The self-catered units offer private, furnished balconies overlooking the Kos countryside.

Each spacious apartment features free Wi-Fi access, a kitchenette with fridge, cooking hobs and a dining area. Most apartments feature 2 balconies offering both sunrise and sunset views.

Guests are greeted with a welcome platter full of local delicacies. The restaurant serves breakfast and dinner and you can enjoy a drink at the bar. There is a lobby with free access to a satellite TV, game consoles and a small library.

A mini market is easily accessible within a 4-minute walk from apartments Ilios and Irene. Mastichari offers many traditional taverns serving fresh fish and other specialities 400 metres away. The capital city Kos is 20 km away and Kos Airport is at 4 km.

Poi.Name: Alma Hotel
Poi.Description: ​A 2-star hotel in beautiful Kardamena of Kos.

Poi.Name: Andavis Hotel
Poi.Description:
Hotel Andavis is in the centre of Kardamena, 400 metres from the main square and close to the bars, restaurants and nightclubs. It is a short walk from the beach.

All rooms include en suite bathroom with shower, fridge, telephone and balcony/terrace. Air conditioning is available at extra cost.

The small and friendly hotel offers a lounge area and it is within walking distance from the beach. There is a swimming pool available to use at Agrellis Apartments across the road.

The Hotel Andavis is approximately 11 km from Kos Airport.

Poi.Name: Palm Beach
Poi.Description:
Set only 50 meters from a small sandy bay, (in one of the best beaches on the island of Kos), 300 meters from the new kos marina and only twenty minutes walk from the harbor of Kos town.

 Palm beach hotel is a charming holiday base that offers very professional service to its clientele.

 Focused around its beautiful pool, the hotel is brightly furnished in exotic style.​

Poi.Name: Cirillo Family Hotel
Poi.Description:
​

Kostas and Pepe make everyone feel welcome and will put themselves out to help you in any way that they can. Those of you who know them will now see a bit more of them!!

The hotel is situated in a quiet area, set in gardens, about 250 metres from the nearest mini-market, and about 400 metres from the village centre and the beach.

The bar is open (serving breakfasts in the morning) every day from 08.30 -14.30 and from 18.30 until everyone decides to go to bed!

Poi.Name: Angeliki Hotel
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kardamena.

Poi.Name: Iris
Poi.Description:
Featuring a swimming pool and a snack bar amidst its lush garden, Iris Hotel lies within 100 metres from the pebbled Psalidi Beach in Kos Island. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony overlooking the Aegean Sea, the garden or the mountain.

The simply appointed rooms of Iris have wooden furnishings and tiled floors. Each unit is equipped with a fridge and a telephone. They all include a private bathroom with shower, while a hairdryer is also available upon request.

Poi.Name: Annika Hotel
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kardamena.

Poi.Name: Argiri Hotel & Apartments
Poi.Description:
Argiri Hotel & Apartments is located on the coastal road in Kardamena, 200 metres from shops, bars and restaurants and 50 metres from the main beach.

The complex has a lovely pool area with sun deck and barbecue facilities. There is also a restaurant and a bar with large terrace, as well as a games room with billiards.

Free Wi-Fi and free private parking is available to all guests.

The rooms of Argiri Hotel & Apartments are bright and functional. They all come with air conditioning, a private balcony, fridge and tea/coffee making facilities.

Argiri Hotel & Apartments is situated on the southern side of Kos island, 5 kilometres from Ippokratis Airport.

Poi.Name: Cleopatra Classic Hotel
Poi.Description:
Located 100 metres away from Kardamena Beach, Cleopatra Classic Hotel has a swimming pool with children’s section and a poolside snack bar. Its rooms open out to a private balcony.

Cleopatra Classic rooms are tastefully furnished and equipped with a satellite TV and a mini fridge. The private bathroom features a shower and a hairdryer.

Guests can enjoy drinks, cocktails and light meals at the tables by the pool and room service is also available. BBQ or Greek nights with live music are organized on a regular basis.

The centre of Kardamena is 100 metres away. Hippocrates International Airport is around 10 km away, while the main town of Kos can be reached at 26 km. Free Wi-Fi is available in the public areas.

Poi.Name: Dimimar Apartments
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kardamena.

Poi.Name: Elga Apartments
Poi.Description:
​The Elga Apartments is in a very good location, close to the bars and in the center of Kardamena. It has a large pool and snack Bar with a wide variety of foods such as baguettes and burgers.
The rooms are in very good size with good terraces and kitchen.

Poi.Name: Hariklia Apartments
Poi.Description: ​Hariklia apartments are located at Kardamena of Kos island. All rooms are comfortable and will offer you a pleasant stay.

Poi.Name: Ino Hotel Apartments
Poi.Description:
Ino Hotel Apartments is set amidst a well-tended garden in the lively village of Kardamena, just 250 metres from the sandy beach. Featuring a children’s playground and BBQ facilities, the property offers self-catering accommodation with free Wi-Fi.

The studios and apartments of Ino are simply furnished and open out to a private balcony overlooking the surrounding mountains and the Aegean Sea. Each unit includes a dining area and a kitchenette with electric oven and fridge. The private bathroom is stocked with a hairdryer.

Kos Town and Port is 26 km from Ino Hotel Apartments, while Kos International Airport is at 7 km. The centre of Kardamena, where guests will find restaurants, bars and supermarkets lies within a short walk. Free private parking is possible on site.

Poi.Name: Kallia Apartments
Poi.Description: ​If the holiday night life is as important to you as the beach, the Kallia Apartments could be your destination of choice. Located just 500 metres from the centre of Kardamena, they offer the ideal position to enjoy the buzzing social scene of Kos’s most lively resort. The guests here are within an easy walk of bars, tarvernas, discos and restaurants – all you need for a holiday-long party

Poi.Name: Kardamena Hotel
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kardamena.

Poi.Name: Kardamos Hotel
Poi.Description:
Located in popular Kardamema, Kardamos Hotel enjoys views over the sea. Kentriki Beach is 15 minutes’ walk. Sports and leisure facilities include outdoor pools, tennis and badminton courts.

Family-run Kardamos provides a choice of self-catering studios or traditional rooms, all with direct sea views. All units feature a fridge, while studios also include a fully equipped kitchenette. Safes and air conditioning are available upon charge.

Refreshing drinks, snacks and light meals are available at the pool bar. The lobby bar has an outdoor seating area with shade provided by the grape vines.

Guests can take a break from the sun in the hotel’s lobby with pool table and satellite TV. Internet facilities are also available here, for a surcharge. Luggage storage is provided at the 24-hour front desk.

Situated 5 minutes’ walk from all the shops, restaurants and bars in the centre, Kardamos Hotel is just 7 km from the airport. Free on-site parking is provided.

Poi.Name: Karmelina Apartments
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kardamena.

Poi.Name: Mamouzelos Hotel Apartments
Poi.Description:
Located in the fishing village of Kardamena, the family-run Mamouzelos Hotel Apartments offers self-catering accommodation with a private balcony. It includes a bar and it is within walking distance from Kardamena Beach.

Mamouzelos studios and apartments are spacious, some with views over the palm-tree garden of the hotel. They have a dining area and a kitchenette equipped with electric kettle and mini fridge. All units also come with a TV and a private bathroom.

Guests can enjoy a drink or cocktail at the stone-paved terrace by the lush garden or at the indoor lounge featuring a satellite TV.

Seaside taverns and cafes can be found just a short walk from the hotel. Kos Airport is 7 km away, while the main town of the island is at 27 km. Free public parking is available near the premises.

Poi.Name: Marigo Hotel
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kardamena.

Poi.Name: Mikargy Hotel
Poi.Description:
​The 2-star hotel Mikargy located in Kos Kardamena, a seaside village that has evolved in recent years in a popular tourist resort. It is 29 km from Kos town and is home to many tourist centers, taverns, restaurants, cafes and bars. Guests can make their dives in the sea that is considered one of the busiest, with endless golden sands and crystal clear waters. For those who like watersports, they can find the necessary equipment near them.

In the classical furnishing of the rooms, guests will find among other facilities a private bathroom with shower, regular cleaning, telephone, fridge and balcony with the possibility to add an extra bed upon request with extra charge. In other areas, guests can relax in the main pool, surrounded by free sun beds and umbrellas as well as the adjacent snack bar open all day and serves small meals and a variety of cool drinks.

Poi.Name: Nikolios Apartments
Poi.Description: ​Nikolios Apartments are very clean, about 5-10 minutes walk from the bars and restaurants of Kardamena with relaxed and fun atmosphere.

Poi.Name: Nissia Kamares Hotel Apartments
Poi.Description: ​Built in a very distinctive traditional Greek island style, Nissia Kamares Hotel Apartments comprises 38 studios and apartments on two floors. The complex is attractively designed amongst lushly green gardens. Just three minutes walk from the golden beaches and the centre of Kardamena, is ideally situated for the guest who wishes privacy yet vicinity to the action. Nissia Kamares Hotel Apartments has always been a favorite because of its cozy atmosphere and its quiet location. The aim of the hotel personel is for every guest to feel at home and enjoy the really best of Greek hospitality.

Poi.Name: Perivoli Hotel
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kardamena.

Poi.Name: Seva Hotel & Apartments
Poi.Description:
Located in the centre of village and only a 3-minute walk from Kardamena's golden beaches, Seva Hotel boasts the largest pool in the area, an indoor heated pool and a hot tub.

At the centre of the complex, there is a large swimming pool with swim-up pool bar and sun terrace with free sun beds. Barbeques are frequently organised here.

Seva Hotel & Apartments features rooms with balcony, bathroom and kitchenette with kettle and toaster, as well as satellite TV. Air conditioning and safe are available at an extra charge.

The many hotel facilities include a fully equipped gym, 24-hour bar, serving food and drinks, and a large TV with International satellite channels and pool tables.

The centrally located Seva offers easy access to taverns, bars, shops and restaurants. The main harbour becomes extremely lively in the evenings with nightclubs and bars. Kos Town is 28km away.

Poi.Name: Sunbeam Apartments
Poi.Description: ​Well positioned right on the beach in the middle of this lively resort, the Sunbeam enjoys a prime spot amongst all that Kardamena has to offer.

Poi.Name: Valinakis Beach Hotel
Poi.Description:
​Situated on the east coast of the island in Kardamena overlooking the sea and the dry river bed (in the summer) beyond the Kardemena bridge The hotel accommodates 150 people and is a three star hotel with a good reputation for service and attention to detail. Most guests stay bed and breakfast enjoying a full English breakfast or a continental breakfast.

The staff is friendly and can give you good advice on tours of the island. Safe deposit boxes are available and the hotel offers a 24 hour service. Rooms are serviced on a daily basis. All rooms have shower, a balcony with view of the sea and offer single bed and family rooms. The hotel also offers furnished apartments on the beach with access to all hotel facilities. All the apartments are within close proximity to the hotel.

Poi.Name: Varkas Apartments
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kardamena.

Poi.Name: Vergina Apartments
Poi.Description:
Located in a quiet neighbourhood close to Kardamena Centre, Vergina Apartments offers self-catering accommodation with free Wi-Fi and free on-site parking. The beach is just 150 metres away, while at 200 metres guests can find bars, restaurants and supermarkets.

Vergina air-conditioned studios and apartments are spacious and have a balcony. Each comes with a kitchenette with refrigerator, a TV and a safe. They also have a private bathroom equipped with toiletries and a hairdryer.

Kardamena beach is ideal for water sports, such as wind surfing and water skiing. The main town of Kos is 35 km away from Vergina. Kos Airport is less than a 10-minute drive away. An airport transfer can be arranged upon request and at extra charge.

Poi.Name: Andromeda Apartments Hotel
Poi.Description:
Facing the Mediterranean Sea, this apartment complex incorporates modern comforts in its own small paradise, and offers views of Kos port and the Asian coast.

With a tree-lined back drop, the elegantly decorated, spotlessly clean and spacious rooms have views of the sea and the mountains. Rest on your balcony or terrace and let the Mediterranean breeze help you relax and unwind.

Children will enjoy the kids' swimming pool and playground surrounded by a lawn and garden area. Take time out to sunbathe and swim in the large outdoor adult pool. Staff are always on hand to offer personal service during your stay.

By renting a car, bicycle or motorbike from the hotel, you can make your own travel plans to see more of the north-eastern area and the rest of Kos. A bicycle lane next to the main road will give you access to the main town in 15 minutes.

Poi.Name: Sun Set
Poi.Description:
Sunset Hotel offers a large swimming pool, 2 bars and a tennis court set within a palm-tree garden.
All accommodation types enjoy views of the Aegean Sea, the pool or the mountain, while Tigaki Beach is 800 metres away.

The air-conditioned rooms, studios and apartments at Sunset have a private balcony and en-suite bathroom with shower. They are all equipped with a mini fridge, while most units also include a kitchenette.

The poolside bar serves light meals, drinks and coffees at a shaded area, while BBQ nights are organized by the hotel’s staff. Within 50 metres, guests can also find traditional restaurants and a super market.

The main town of Kos is 10 km away and Hippocrates International Airport is at 13 km. Free private parking is provided on site and free Wi-Fi is available in the hotel’s lounge.

​

Poi.Name: Oasis
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kardamena.

Poi.Name: Golden Star
Poi.Description:
​Set within well-kept gardens, the 3-star hotel features an outdoor pool and a restaurant with homemade flavours.

All rooms have a balcony and a kitchenette with fridge. Daily cleaning service is provided, and air conditioning is available at a charge.

Guests can enjoy organic products from the small farm right next to the hotel. Homemade products such as jams are also available.

There are free sun beds and umbrellas around the pool, and snacks and drinks are available at the pool bar. Children will enjoy a playground and kid’s pool. BBQ events, containing fresh fish and homemade dishes, are organized twice a week.

Water sports, beach bars and restaurants are available on the 3-km long Tigaki Beach. The hotel is 9 km from Kos International Airport (KGS), and 10 km from Kos Town and the port. The lake of Tigaki can be found within a walking distance.

The 24-hour front desk can assist guests with currency exchange, and car or bicycle rental. Bus service is available at 100 metres. The hotel also offers a free parking area.

Poi.Name: Theodorou Beach
Poi.Description:
The Theodorou Beach Hotel is 1500m from the center of Kos town, 400m from the marina, on the beach in the Psalidi area. It is a 3* accommodation.
It consists of apartments and studios and it has a nice beach with a beach-bar-restaurant, a swimming-pool, childrens-pool, play-land, main bar, breakfast room, 24h reception, free internet service in the lobby.

It is possible to rent bikes and motorcycles just outside the hotel. There are mini markets, restaurants and tavernas nearby. There is a bus stop 30m from the hotel and a cycling-road.

Nostos Cafe-Bar is just across the road and it is very nice for night entertainment.

Umbrellas and sun-beds are free of charge at the pool and there is a charge at the beach.

​

Poi.Name: Aegean Village
Poi.Description: Aegean Village can cater for a wide variety of needs for all age groups. There is something for everyone to do. There are three fresh water swimming pools, two outdoor and one indoor. The outdoor swimming pools are one of Olympic size and one separate children's pool. In the fitness center the indoor pool brings to mind a roman bath, which can be heated in the cooler months. Here the Jacuzzi, Saunas, Gym, and Massage Facility are also housed.​

Poi.Name: Asteras Resort
Poi.Description:
The hotel consists of 9 buildings surrounding the hotel's swimming pools The whole complex lies amidst beautifully landscaped gardens and consists of 108 completely renovated rooms (double and triple rooms ,as well as family rooms) offering garden or sea side view. All rooms are equipped with direct dial telephone, air-conditioning, hairdryer, safe deposit box (payable), satellite T.V, radio set and mini fridge and all dispose private balcony or terrace.

​
​

Poi.Name: Afentoulis Studios
Poi.Description:
Afentouli rooms are bright and airy featuring fitted beds. They include a fully equipped kitchen with dining area. They are equipped with air conditioning, a TV and hairdryer, and they have private bathrooms. All Afentouli hotel units have balconies offering lovely views of the sea or the garden.

Guests can enjoy traditional desserts, cheese and eggs free of charge, as well as fresh fruits and vegetables from the hotel's own garden.

Within 100 metres guests can find supermarkets, taverns and cafes. Kos airport is a 15-minute drive from Afentouli Studios.

Poi.Name: Angelos Studios
Poi.Description:
​​ Located just outside of Kos Town, in a semi-rural haven, but within 6 minutes from the seafront.

Studios (for 1-2 persons) consist of two single beds, separate bathroom, with shower, the kitchen area consist of a 2 ring hob, refrigerator, electric kettle, room safe(at additional cost ) and Air-condition cost (at additional cost ), Gro​​​und floor studios have a terraced area, and the first floor studios have a balcony.​

Poi.Name: Agios Stefanos Studios & Apartments
Poi.Description:
Just 100 metres from the sandy Kefalos Beach in Kos, the family-run Agios Stefanos Studios & Apartments features self-catered units with a balcony overlooking the Aegean Sea and the mountain.

A kitchenette with a fridge and electric ke ttle is included in all accommodation types at the Agios Stefanos. Each has a TV and a private bathroom with shower.

Shops, bars and traditional taverns serving fresh fish are within a 5-minute walk. The centre of Kefalos is 2 km away. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can offer information on nearby beaches such as Paradise and Kamila. Free, private parking is possible on site​

Poi.Name: Blue Domes Mitsis
Poi.Description:
5-star beachfront Mitsis Blue Domes Exclusive Resort & Spa features a 650-metre-long pool complex of 8 large pools and 6 sharing pools. The all-inclusive hotel offers guests 10 dining options and 7 bars.

The fresh and breezy rooms are fully air-conditioned with minibar, 26-inch satellite LCD TV, and internet access. Room service is provided 18 hours a day and each room has a private balcony or terrace. Wi-Fi is free in communal hotel areas.

The main restaurant serves American buffet breakfast and late Continental breakfast. All meals are served in a show cooking buffet style. Every night, guests have the possibility to taste specialties from Greek and international cuisine, such as, Italian, Asian, Mexican and fish specialties.

A full range of beauty services are on offer at the on-site spa. A hot tub, massage rooms and indoor pool are featured. Sports facilities include water polo, tennis, pedalos and aerobics. Younger guests will enjoy the sweet-water children’s pool with waterslides, playrooms and animation programme.​​​

Poi.Name: Bristol Sea View Hotel Apts.
Poi.Description:
​Bristol Sea View Hotel Apartments is located in the center of Kos town, just in front of the main coastal road and few steps from Kos highlights.

The hotel is a modern complex of 26 spacius and comfortable air conditioned apartments, fully equipped, ready to accommodate up to 5 persons. Most apartments have spectacular view across the deep blue Aegean Sea.

The hotel is easilly accesible by public transportation or taxi from the airport and walking distance from Kos main port.

Our main concern is to make your stay comfortable so that your vacation on the beautiful island of Kos will be an unforgettable experience!​

Poi.Name: Bristol Apartments
Poi.Description:
​These Studio Apartments are located in the centre of Kos town, 100 metres from the port and 300 metres from Kos town's beach. The main square and the Hippokrates Tree are just 200 metres away.

The Bristol Apartments offer a comfortable stay with free Wi-Fi throughout the entire property and air-conditioned rooms with a bathroom, kitchen facilities and a private balcony. Guests enjoy special rates at a nearby Chinese restaurant.

Bristol Apartments is only a few minutes' walk from the Dolfins' Square and a 2-minute walk from the small harbour, where you can take local excursions by boat. The town’s marketplace is also nearby.​

Poi.Name: Ampavris Family Apartments
Poi.Description:
Ampavris Family Apartments is a family business for over 20 years, where you will experience a friendly, warm, comfortable environment.

It is known for its hospitality and fun atmosphere. It is located on a small hill, with a quiet surrounding, 1.2 km from the beach as well as Kos town centre, 1.6km from the port, 1km from Kaza Romana the impressive Roman house and 1.4km from the most well-known ancient monument of the island, the Asklepieion, which also represents the island of Kos. Moreover, the museum is located just 1km from the apartments.​​​

Poi.Name: Bliss
Poi.Description:
​The Bliss Apartments is a new, small family owned property in Kardamena, situated in quiet area about 300m from the central square of the village and about 400m from the beach.

All rooms have modern interior and bright colors with several decorative details that is not to mention other benefits like fully equipped kitchen with utensils, bathroom with toiletries and shower, hot water all day, balcony and on request can be added extra child beds. The reception has a comfortable waiting area and relaxation while staff provided information on proposed island tours and attractions. Next to the lobby there is a bar that is open until late at night. The large pool with the particular area for children and outdoor bar surrounded by sun loungers and parasols are ideal relaxation spots. The bar stays open until late in the evening, where cocktails and drinks are served for those who want to stay awake till late in the evening.​

Poi.Name: Byron
Poi.Description:
​Boasting a private beach area in Tigaki, Byron Apartments offers self-catering accommodation with views to the Aegean Sea.

It is set within a garden featuring free sun beds and a playground.

Byron rooms are air-conditioned and simply furnished. They include a kitchen or kitchenette, and a TV. They also have a private bathroom and a furnished balcony enjoying sea and mountain views.

The centre of Tigaki village is around 1.5 km away from the hotel. The main town and port of Kos are within a 15-minute drive. A bus stop can be found right next to the apartments. On-site private parking is available free of charge.​

Poi.Name: Captain Sun
Poi.Description:
​Captain Sun Apartments is located in Kardamena, on the south coast of Kos. It offers self catering studios and apartments. It also has a 24-hour reception and snack bar.

The hotel is 30 kilometres from Kos town and 6 kilometres from Hippocrates International Airport.

Apartments come with air conditioning, a television, kitchenette, refrigerator, hairdryer and safety deposit box.

Captain Sun is a good base for exploring Kardamena's vibrant nightlife and gorgeous beaches. Watersports, shopping, local restaurants, bars and supermarkets are within walking distance.​

Poi.Name: Catherine
Poi.Description:
​Situated within a 3-minute walk from the promenade of Kos, and 40 metres from the ferry terminal, Catherine Hotel features rooms with free Wi-Fi. Restaurants, shops and bars are within 100 metres.

Each of Hotel Catherine's air-conditioned rooms has large windows or balcony with views over Kos Port and the town. Rooms include a TV and a refrigerator. All units have a private bathroom with shower.

The hotel serves a breakfast buffet each morning. Local drinks and coffee are available at the on-site bar.

Guests are within a 10-minute walk from the Castle of the Knights and Zouroudi beach is within 100 metres. Psalidi Beach is at 3 km. Staff can arrange car and bicycle rental.​

Poi.Name: Chrysoula Hotel and Apartments
Poi.Description:
​Just 150 metres away from Kefalos Beach, Chrysoula Hotel offers self-catering apartments with views to the Aegean Sea or the surrounding garden. It includes a large swimming pool and a poolside snack bar.

The Chrysoula Apartments, established in 1987, rest in a tranquil area a short walk from the main road in Kefalos, just 150m from the sweeping beach with the sapphire blue Sea beyond. Within easy walking distance of the centre of the village of Kefalos and from the beach, this friendly 3 Star hotel is close to all local amenities, bars and restaurants and features 60 comfortable self-catering studios and one-bedroom apartments spread over 7 buildings. Warm and friendly atmosphere. Extensive facilities for a hotel in this category. The Hotel is recommended in a number of guidebooks.​

Poi.Name: Columbia Beach
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Kos.

Poi.Name: Denise
Poi.Description:
​The Denise Apartments is perfectly located just 300 metres from the beach, 600 metres from the harbour, 800 metres from the Scala resort area and just under a mile from the village of Kefalos.

 The apartments are surrounded by olive and pine trees and offers 8 studios and 4 apartments, each with a fully equipped kitchen, en suite facilities and a balcony.

Poi.Name: Desire
Poi.Description:
​Centrally located in Kos Town, family-run Studios Desiree is a 10-minute walk from the beach and offers Continental breakfast. The self-catered rooms feature free wired internet.

The air-conditioned units at the Desiree are simply decorated with light blue and green colours. Each includes a TV and a kitchenette with a fridge and cooking hobs. All rooms have a furnished balcony overlooking the main road leading to Kos Port.

Guests have free access to a swimming pool 40 metres from the hotel.
Shops, taverns serving fresh fish and beach bars are within a 5-minute walk from the property. Scenic Thermes Beach with the warm waters is 12 km away.

Poi.Name: Edmark
Poi.Description: ​2-star hotel Edmark​, located in Psalidi Kos just 100 meters from the beach. The city of Kos and the port are about 5 kilometers, the island's airport 24 km. The beach in Psalidi is  popular on the island and its largest part is organized with sunbeds and umbrellas. It is also ideal for fans of water sports. The area has several dining options, cafes and nightlife.   P​alm trees  surround the pool area. There is also a paddling pool for safe swimming. The facilities include asports like mini golf, basketball, tennis and a room with billiards and s ping pong table. The hotel features a living room with satellite TV and bar for relaxing moments, while for the hot summer days there is a terrace. There are a total of 53 rooms and 10 bungalows which have a balcony with views, air conditioning and telephone, some with kitchen and refrigerator.

Poi.Name: Efi Studios
Poi.Description:
​Surrounded by a garden, Efi Studios are located 100 metres from Kefalos Beach and 150 metres from the village centre. Taverns, restaurants and shops can be reached within a short walk.

Decorated in bright colours and fitted with iron beds, all air-conditioned rooms open to a spacious balcony facing the garden and the Aegean Sea. Each has a kitchenette with a fridge, cooking hobs and kettle. A hairdryer and safe are included.

Guests staying at Efi Studios can visit the monastery of Agios Nikolas. The town of Kos can be easily reached by regular bus, which stops 80 metres away.

Poi.Name: Irene Apartments & Studios
Poi.Description:
Just 400 metres from Psalidi Beach in Kos, Irene Apartments offers many entertainment activities and free Wi-Fi. The self-catered rooms have a furnished balcony overlooking the swimming pool and gardens.

All air-conditioned accommodation at Irene Apartments & Studios includes a TV. Kitchenettes are equipped with a fridge and cooking hobs. A dining area is included.

Guests can relax at the pool bar that serves snacks and drinks. There is also a children’s pool. Hotel staff organize Greek nights with music and dancing, as well as karaoke and quiz nights.

Irene Apartments is 2 km from the centre of Kos Town. Guests are within 450 metres from shops and 600 metres from restaurants. Ippokratis International Airport is 22 km away.

Poi.Name: Elite Apartments
Poi.Description:
​

Offering well-furnished and spacious apartments, Elite Apartments are located 250m from the beach and just a 5-minute walk from the town of Kos.

The warm welcome, the nearby beach and the pool with sun terrace ensure a relaxing and enjoyable holiday base.

A great variety of cocktails, as well as pizza, burgers and other snacks are available at the poolside bar. Guests can check their email with free Wi-Fi and watch satellite television here as well.

Each apartment includes a kitchenette, a living/dining area with sofa beds and a balcony. Guests will feel at home at the fully equipped apartments, offering toaster and boiler, ironing facilities, as well as hair dryer, radio and satellite TV.​

Poi.Name: Fania Apartments
Poi.Description:
​The family-run Fania Apartments is only 100 metres from the beach of Kardamena and only 2 minutes’ walk from restaurants and bars. It offers self-catering apartments with private balcony.

Fania Apartments are spacious and each offers a TV and fridge, as well as a toaster and a cooker. All units have a bathroom with hairdryer. Air conditioning and safe can be provided at an additional charge.

Fania guests can enjoy the beach or use the swimming pool of the nearby hotel situated only a few metres from the apartment complex.

Kos International Airport is a 10-minute drive. Guests are free to use the public parking area situated close to the hotel.​

Poi.Name: Fili Apartments
Poi.Description:
Featuring 2 outdoor pools and a separate one for children, Fili Hotel Apartments is surrounded by a lush garden. Located 250 metres from Tigkaki Beach, it offers self-catered accommodation, a restaurant and poolside snack bar.

Enjoying Aegean Sea view from their balcony, all studios and apartments have a kitchenette with a fridge and kitchenware. Each includes a private bathroom with a shower and towels.

Guests can choose between a continental or full English breakfast to start their day. Homemade Greek specialties are served at the restaurant, while snacks and drinks can be ordered at the poolside bar. Fili also organizes BBQ nights with Greek dancing.​

Poi.Name: Fourtounis Hotel
Poi.Description:
​​​Fourtounis Hotel is ideally situated in a quiet and remote village in the heart of Kefalos Bay, and only 150 meters away from the beach .

All rooms feature modern comforts and amenities to make guests feel at home, satisfying the most demanding needs.

Fourtounis guests enjoy easy access to the sea with all its activities. Enjoy sightseeing, hiking or cycling on trails along the mountains. Supermarkets and restaurants are also found within close proximity.

Poi.Name: Gelli Apartments
Poi.Description:
​Gelli Apartments enjoy an elevated position with panoramic view over the sea, Kos Town and the mountains. A 10-minute walk will take you to Kos Town centre.

Bright and airy, Gelli studios and apartments open out to a balcony enjoying garden views. Each is fitted with an electric kettle, cooking hobs and mini fridge. All units come with a private bathroom with either bathtub or shower.

Gelli guests are welcome to use the swimming pool and bar of the nearby Ampavris Family Apartments. Free on-site parking is also available.

The seaside village of Tigaki is a 15-minute drive away from the complex. Kos Airport is within 23 km.

Poi.Name: Haralambos Apartments
Poi.Description:
​The complex of rooms and apartments Harrys Studios is located directly across the picturesque sandy beach of Kefalos village on Kos Island. A Supermarket is within walking distance and the center with its many bars, restaurants and cafes is just a few meters away. Guests can cut their teeth  in water sports club the area offers,however this does not mean there is no peace and relaxation  to be had. The complex is built next to the local bus stop​​. 

 Rooms and studios have double beds, kitchen, hob and fridge, bathroom and balcony or terrace and upon request extra child beds​ can be added . Guests will spend relaxing moments at the bar sipping a drink while the restaurant offers breakfast, lunch and dinner.  A tourist shop within the hotel offers all basic amenities while the  reception will provide you with all information vital to your stay.  Internet access, parking, laundry service and central safe all within the package.​

Poi.Name: Ilias Studios
Poi.Description:
​

Just 100 metres from Kardamena Beach in Kos, Ilias Studios offers free Wi-Fi and self-catered rooms with a sunny balcony. The centre of Kardamena with bars and taverns is at 400 metres.

All units at the Ilias are equipped with a TV. Rooms have a kitchenette with a fridge, electric kettle and cooking hobs. Each includes a bathroom with shower and amenities.

Kos International Airport is 7 km away and the centre of Kos Town is 30 km away. Guests can find public swimming pools within a 5-minute walk.​

Poi.Name: Holiday Village Resort
Poi.Description:
​The Holiday Village concept combines modern accommodation and a wide range of activities. The club style unique facilities and organized activities and are able to provide an unforgettable experience to all.

​

Highlights:

-All-Inclusive
- Ideal for families with children of all ages who seek for an active holiday, elderly, youth, sport, entertainment enthusastics
-Direct access to the beach (separated be a small local road)
-Beach and filed surroundings

Poi.Name: Ipokampos
Poi.Description:
Ipokampos is located within a 10-minute walk from the beach in a peaceful area. It offers basic accommodation with garden views, a bar and free private parking.

Each room at Ipokampos is air-conditioned with well-equipped kitchenette, fridge and TV and has a balcony. Safety boxes and hair dryers are standard.

A public swimming pool is situated right opposite Ipokampos, while also available within easy walking distance is a children’s playground and a supermarket.

The beach of Kamari, the island’s most famous beach, is situated 1-2 km eastern to the village of Kefalos. Its extensive water sports facilities include windsurfing and kite surfing.

Poi.Name: Jack's Apartments
Poi.Description:
​Featuring an outdoor pool with a sun terrace and poolside snack bar, Jack’s Apartments is located 500 metres from Kamari Beach.

It offers self-catered accommodation, billiards and a library. A restaurant for a la carte breakfast is available.

All apartments are spacious and open to a balcony with views to the pool or the Aegean Sea. Each includes a kitchenette with a mini fridge, cooking hobs and kettle. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower.

Guests can find restaurants and a mini market at 500 metres from Jack’s Apartments. The property lies 3.5 km from Kefalos Town and 15 km from Kos International Airport. The main town and port of Kos is 43 km away.​

Poi.Name: Jonathan Apartments
Poi.Description:
Jonathan Studio Apartments are ideally situated 35 metres from the beach, in the seaside village of Tigaki.

The complex offers self-catering rooms, a swimming pool and free Wi-Fi throughout.

Jonathan Apartments are modernly decorated and bright. Each has a kitchenette equipped a microwave, fridge and electric kettle. Other facilities include a TV, hairdryer and safe. All rooms have balcony with sea or garden views.

Free sun beds and umbrellas are available by the pool, while there is also a pool bar serving refreshing drinks, coffees and snacks.

A bus station is located right outside the hotel. Tigaki is only a 10-minute drive from Kos town and a 15-minute drive from the airport and the port.​

Poi.Name: Kalonisa Studios
Poi.Description:
Located 150 metres from the beach of Kefalos, Kalonisa offers studios with a balcony overlooking the Aegean Sea, or the mountains of Kos and the garden.

Each studio has a kitchenette with cooking hobs and a fridge. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with shower.

Guests can use a pool in another property just 40 metres from the hotel Kalonisa. Kos Port is 42 km away and Kos International Airport is at 14 km. Free private parking is offered at the property.

Poi.Name: Kardamena Holidays
Poi.Description:
​

Kardamena Holiday Apartments offers self-catered accommodation, a 5-minute walk from the beach. Free Wi-Fi access is provided in the bar area, and parking on site is free.

The large studios and apartments have a kitchenette with sandwich maker, kettle, and fridge. Each includes a TV, safe and private bathroom, and most have balcony with inland view.

Holiday Apartments Kardamena offers a bar. The hotel’s reception offers tourist information. A public swimming pool is featured at 10 metres’ distance.

Kardamena centre with its many shops, restaurants and exciting nightlife is within 10 minutes’ walk.​

Poi.Name: Kefalos
Poi.Description:
​

Studios Kefalos offer self-catered rooms with a balcony overlooking the Aegean Sea. The centre of Kefalos village with its whitewashed houses is a 5-minute walk away.

Rooms at the Kefalos have a TV and a dining area. Each includes a kitchenette with a fridge, a coffee maker and cooking hobs. All units include a private bathroom with bath or shower.

The village of Kefalos has taverns serving fresh fish and shops with local products. Kos Town and the port are 43 km away and Kos International Airport is at 17 km. Free private parking is possible on site.​

Poi.Name: Kontessa Apartments
Poi.Description:
In a quiet location just 60 metres from the beach of Kamari in Kefalos, Kontessa Apartments features a swimming pool and a restaurant. It offers self-catered accommodation with a balcony overlooking the Aegean Sea or the garden.

A kitchenette with fridge, dining area and cooking hobs is located in all units at the Kontessa. Each comes with a private bathroom with hairdryer. Some accommodation types have a separate bedroom.

Breakfast including hot and cold dishes is served in the dining area. Local and international specialities are served at the restaurant. Light meals and drinks can be enjoyed at the poolside snack bar.

Guests can relax in the games room that includes a pool table. Free Wi-Fi access is possible in public areas.

Staff can arrange car rental to explore Kos Town 35 km away. The property is 15 km from Kos International Airport. Free private parking is available on site.​

Poi.Name: Kos Island Studios
Poi.Description: The studios are located at the resort centre of Kefalos just 5 minutes walk from the beach. It's close to all local amenities, bars and restaurants and at the same time are ​far from the traffic noise. Its ideal for families and couples who wants to have luxury at a reasonable cost....​

Poi.Name: Ladikos Beach Studios
Poi.Description: ​Ladikos Beach Studios are ideally situated on the beach front at the edge of the village of Kardamena. A short walk to the numerous restaurants and bars.They are owned by Johnny Ladikos who lives above the studios and available 24/7.​

Poi.Name: Mammis Beach Studios
Poi.Description:
Conveniently located on the beach, Mammis Beach Studios is 1.5 km from Kadamena Village, boasting restaurants and shops. It features an outdoor pool, pool bar and rooms with a balcony overlooking the pool or Aegean Sea.

The accommodation at Mammis Beach offers a fridge, electric kettle and wardrobe. A shower, hairdryer and toiletries are included in the private bathroom. Air conditioning is available upon request with surcharge.

The on-site restaurant prepares breakfast and other meals throughout the day and occasionally hosts BBQs. Light meals and refreshing drinks are provided by the snack bar.

Guests can choose to play in the games room, unwind with a book borrowed from the on-site library or lay back on the sun beds that surround the pool.

Mammis Beach Studios is only 7 km from Kos Airport. Kos Town is situated 26 km from the property. Private parking is available and is free of charge.

Poi.Name: Mannias
Poi.Description:
Located 500 metres away from Kos Port and main town, as well as the nearest beach, Manias Apartments offers tastefully furnished accommodation with kitchenette facilities. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property.

The air-conditioned Manias studios and apartments are decorated in warm earthy tones, each featuring a private balcony. They are equipped with a TV, mini oven and refrigerator. All units have their own bathroom with hairdryer.

Guests will find bars and restaurants at 60 metres and a super market at 150 metres. Hippocrates International Airport is 27 km away. Free public parking is available near the premises.​​​

Poi.Name: Manolis Studios
Poi.Description:
Manolis Studios are located in Kefalos Kos. The nearest beach is the beach of Agios Stefanos.  Camel beach is located half a mile from the Studios. The Monastery of St. John can be reached after a few minutes drive. Very close to the hotel and the center of the village one can find cafes, bars, restaurants and shops.
 Manolis Studios is an apartment complex that has a reception room and hotel facilities. All rooms have kitchenette, fridge and kettle, as well as shower, closets, hairdryer and balcony with views.
For guests of the hotel who can not or do not want to swim in the sea, it is possible to swim in the hotel pool. Around the pool there are sun loungers and parasols. The pool bar serves drinks and snacks throughout the day. The hotel has its own garden with trees and space for car parking . Public areas of the Manolis Studios provide wireless Internet for free. Pets are not allowed.

​

Poi.Name: Mare Blue Appartments
Poi.Description:
​The Mare Blue Apartments is a 2 star hotel located a short distance from the popular beach of Lambi, the northeastern part of Kos. The capital and main port is 1.5 km and there are regular connections to local transportation. The island's airport is 21 km. Many area attractions are quickly accessible and these include Ancient Agora, Basilica of Agia Paraskevi, the Mosque, the Tree of Hippocrates, Asklipieio and the castles of Antimahia and Neratzia.

The number of rooms reaches 13 which is air conditioned and has a kitchen. Residents can spend hours relaxing on the terrace, the garden and can rent cars and bicycles on site. Within the  space of Mare Blue Apartments  free wireless internet access and private parking area. are available.

Poi.Name: Marina Studios
Poi.Description:
Marina Studios offers spacious self-catering accommodation with free Wi-Fi in the centre of Kardamena. Located within a 5-minute walk from the beach and 400 metres from the central square, the property features a bar.

Featuring wooden furnishings and tiled floors, all studios of Marina include a kitchenette with fridge and cooking hobs. Each unit opens out to a balcony.

Marina Studios is located 7 kilometres from the airport and 30 kilometres from Kos Town. A wide range of water sports, shops, restaurants and nightlife can be found at a short walk.

Poi.Name: Maritsa studios
Poi.Description: ​These pleasant and simply furnished studio's are set back from the main road, set in pretty gardens, on the outskirts of Kamari Bay.​

Poi.Name: Nefeli Apartments
Poi.Description:
Nefeli Apartments offers self-catered rooms with furnished balcony, 150 metres from the sea. Balconies overlook the garden and the surrounding olive groves.

The three-storey apartments are air-conditioned, and each features a fitted bed and tiled floors. They have a kitchenette with cutlery, kettle and fridge, and a bathroom with toiletries. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout.

Nefeli guests can prepare their own meals. Fresh vegetables are offered right from the hotel’s garden.

Guests will find a municipal swimming pool and a tennis court, within a 10-minute drive. The hotel is 15 km from Kos International Airport. Kos centre is 35 km away. Free parking is available.​

Poi.Name: Nikos 2 studio & apartments
Poi.Description:
Featuring an outdoor pool with sun loungers and a snack bar, Nikos 2 Studios & Aparments is set amidst a flowered garden, 300 metres from Kardamena Beach. It offers self-catered accommodation and free Wi-Fi in public areas.

Bright and simply furnished, all studios and apartments open out to a balcony with mountain views. Each has a kitchenette with a mini fridge, 2 cooking rings and dining table. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower or bathtub.

Staff at Nikos 2 can arrange car rental to explore Kos Town, at 29 km. Shops and restaurants can be found at 900 metres, while Kos International Airport is 8 km away. Free, private parking is available on site.

Poi.Name: Nitsa Rooms
Poi.Description:
Nitsa Rooms offers self-catering accommodation with private balconies. Guests enjoy free sun beds and umbrellas on the sandy Lambi beach, only 30 metres away.

Studios at Nitsa are air conditioned, while some enjoy Aegean Sea views. They include a kitchenette with kettle and refrigerator, and a dining area. All units are also fitted with a TV, iron and a private bathroom with hairdryer.

Late continental breakfast is served either in the room or in the breakfast area located next to the hotel. Throughout the day, guests can also order drinks and lights meals, such as pies and sandwiches, from the bar.

Kos Airport is 26 km away from Nitsa. Both the port and the castle of Kos are a 10-minute walk away. Free Wi-Fi and free on-site parking are provided.​

Poi.Name: Nobel
Poi.Description: ​Hotel in Marmari.

Poi.Name: Black Diamond
Poi.Description:
Located 1 km away from the beach of Lampi, Black Diamond offers self-catering accommodation and free Wi-Fi access in its public areas and an on-site restaurant.

Black Diamond studios and apartments have a kitchenette equipped with an electric kettle, tea-and-coffee-making amenities and mini fridge. They also include a dining area, and a balcony enjoying garden views.

The centre of Kos town is 3 km from the hotel, while Kos Airport is at 30 km. Free private on-site parking is provided.

Poi.Name: Olga's Paradise
Poi.Description: ​ Olga's Paradise Apartments is an apartment complex located in Psalidi Kos near the beach and only one kilometer from the town of Kos and the port. The beach of Psalidi is one of the largest and most popular on the island with pebbles and sand while also being equiped for fans of water sports. The area has many dining options, cafes and nightlife. Outside the complex there is a pool and pool bar with adjoining and separate children's pool. In the reception area there is a lounge with satellite TV. The reception provides necessary information while it is possible to rent a car or bike and currency exchange. In the public areas wireless access to the internet. A game  room with billiards and subuteo for fun moments is also offered. The rooms feature a seating area and bathrooms with hair dryer, air conditioning, safe and TV.​

Poi.Name: Origin Apartments
Poi.Description:
T​​his family run property is located in the heart of Kardamena resort only 100 meters from the beach, 7km from the airport and within walking distance to all kinds of restaurants bars and commercial stores but also to means of transportations running throughout the island.

There are 18 clean and comfortable studios and apartments with all necessary facilities 
in a relaxing and homey atmosphere.
At Origin it is offered a safe and friendly environment for all of the guests.

Poi.Name: Panorama Studios
Poi.Description:
The family-run Panorama Studios enjoys panoramic views of the Aegean Sea, hence located on the cape of Kefalos Village in Kos. Set amidst a well-tended garden, it offers self-catered accommodation with free Wi-Fi and a private balcony.

The simply furnished studios of Panorama feature tiled floors and bright colours. Each unit has a kitchenette with fridge, electric kettle and cooking hobs. The private bathroom comes with a shower.

A continental breakfast prepared with fresh, local ingredients is served daily at the dining area which offers views over Agios Stefanos Bay.

Panorama Studios is situated 13 km from Kos International Airport and 40 km from the capital of Kos. The sandy beach of Kefalos is 1 km away from the property. Free private parking is available on site, while staff at the front desk can arrange car rental.​

Poi.Name: Panorama
Poi.Description:
It is situated directly on the seafront, being separated from the beach and sea by a small pedestrian promenade.  sea-facing rooms are offered with unparalleled views of an uncluttered horizon and the sunsets for which this side of the island is well known. Thus the name – “Panorama”.

The Hotel offers four basic apartments on the ground floor.  First floor accommodations were completely refurbished in 2009. five luxury apartments and a self-contained, two-bedroomed flat are available.

All the rooms have en-suite facilities and, in addition to a shower, two of the rooms feature a bath.​

Poi.Name: Paraschos Studios
Poi.Description:
Paraschos Studios offers self-catered accommodation in a quiet area of Kardamena, 5 minutes’ walk from the beach. It features an outdoor pool with sun loungers and free Wi-Fi in public areas.

Studios Paraschos have a kitchenette with refrigerator, 2 cooking rings and a kettle, and also include a large balcony with pool view. Air conditioning is available at an extra charge.

Guests can prepare their own breakfast or enjoy a continental breakfast by the pool upon request.

Paraschos Studios is a 5-minute drive to Kos Airport. The front desk can assist guests with car rental service and offer tourist information. Free parking is available.

Poi.Name: Peridis Family Resort
Poi.Description:
​Enjoy your stay by one of the pools or have fun together with your family and friends trying out some of the many activities. Peridis Family Resort is an oasis in the middle of Kos Town, so when you want to go out and explore nothing is far away.

Rooms feature balconies with city, mountain or pool views. The 90 air-conditioned rooms at Peridis Family Resort include safety deposit boxes and coffee / tea machines. For an additional fee, guests can use the high-speed wired Internet access is provided in the room. Rooms are equipped with flat-panel televisions with satellite channels.  Accommodations include desks and phones. Bathrooms feature shower tub combined with deep soaking bathtubs. Bathrooms also include makeup / shaving mirrors, hair dryers, and slippers. All units at this business-friendly resort feature kitchenettes with microwaves, refrigerators and cookware / dishes / utensils. Additional amenities include complimentary bottled water and windows that open. In addition, amenities available on request include irons / ironing boards and wake-up calls. Housekeeping is offered daily.​

Poi.Name: Peter's Kool Pool
Poi.Description: ​The complex of  Peter's Kool Pool is located near the center of Kardamena,  just a five minute walk from the beach and a three minute walk from the main nightlife hubs. The area offers many leisure facilities for the whole family but also for young couples who wish to enjoy the nightlife and the fine sand​ beaches   spending relaxing moments. The hotel offers 30 comfortable air-conditioned and modern rooms featuring among others a kitchenette, fridge, bathroom , balcony.  Α large swimming pool surrounded by sun loungers and parasols available on site exactly where the adjacent​​ pool bar offers fresh juices and cocktails. The main bar is open till late at night and breakfast is available in the appropriate room. Guests will get the necessary advice and information from the reception while the may  relax in the TV lounge. The facilities include  computer's and game'​s  equipment and wireless internet access.​

Poi.Name: Philippion
Poi.Description: Philippion, located in a central point in the city of Kos, about six meters from the sea. It is also very close to the center and provides easy access to major attractions. It offers air-conditioned rooms - apartments, all with balconies overlooking the pool, sea or city and are equipped with all modern amenities. The main pool with bar - café serves meals. Movement is easy with car customers of Philippion can rent on-site. In the central hall running TV lounge and dining options, is feasible and Internet connectivity in a special place. In a radius of about a thousand meters the occupants of Philippion can visit interesting museums, the beach and have all the entertainment options with dozens of bars, cafes, and any kind of shopping facilities.
Poi.Email: Through the official site's contact form.

Poi.Name: Villa Poppi
Poi.Description:
Just 150 metres from Kefalos Beach, Villa Popi Studios offers a swimming pool and a poolside snack bar. It features studios with free Wi-Fi and a balcony overlooking the mountains of Kos, or the Aegean Sea.

A kitchenette with cooking facilities, fridge, electric kettle and toaster is included in all units at the Villa Popi. Each has a private bathroom with hairdryer.

Sun loungers and umbrellas are available on the sun terrace. A children’s pool is provided for younger guests.

For guests who wish to have breakfast there is a choice of continental or English upon request. Drinks, pizzas, salads and other homemade flavours are served at the snack bar. Restaurants and shops are within a 4-minute walk.

Kos International Airport is at 15 km. Kos Town is 45 km away. Staff can arrange car rental and free private parking is possible on site.​

Poi.Name: Rena Studios
Poi.Description: ​The Rena Studios is an aparthotel located in a coastal area in Lambi, near the town of Kos. It is 2.5 kilometers far from the city and provides easy access to major attractions. It offers rooms, studios and apartments that can accommodate 2 to 5 people. They all have a balcony overlooking the pool, sea or city views and are equipped with all modern amenities. The main pool with bar - café serves meals while for children,there is a children's pool. In the central hall one may find a TV room with dining options,with internet being readily available .  The occupants of Rena Studios can visit the interesting museums, the beach, and great entertainment options with dozens of bars, cafes, and all kinds of shopping facilities.

Poi.Name: Roses Studios
Poi.Description:
Featuring a pool with a children’s section and a poolside snack bar with billiards, Roses Studios is situated in Kefalos Village of Kos, just 50 metres from the beach. It offers free Wi-Fi in its public areas and studios with a private balcony.

Enjoying views over the pool, the garden or the Aegean Sea, the studios of Roses have a kitchenette with fridge and electric kettle. Each simply decorated unit features a private bathroom with shower. A fan is available.

Guests can start their day with a continental or a full English breakfast served daily at the dining area. The on-site snack bar serves coffee, drinks and light meals throughout the day.

Restaurants and supermarkets can be found within a walking distance from Roses Studios. Kos Town and Port is at 38 km, while Kos National Airport is 13 km away. The lively Kardamaina is at 21 km. Free private parking is possible on site.​

Poi.Name: Seagul Apartments
Poi.Description:
This small, family-run resort is situated in scenic surroundings in Psalidi, a 5-minute walk from the beach and a wind-surfing centre. It combines self-catering accommodation and a swimming pool.

The Seagull Apartments offers spacious studios with balcony or patio, and a kitchen corner with fridge and dining table.

Apartments Seagull is surrounded by a spacious garden and the green spaces can be used for sunbathing or as a playground. Barbeques can be organized upon request.

The Seagull is only 5 km from Kos town and 7 km from the Spring Waters of Therma. Free private parking is possible on site.

The friendly hosts of the Seagull will be happy to assist guests with sightseeing information, excursions and car rental.​

Poi.Name: Sevi Apartments
Poi.Description:
Sevi Apartments is set amidst a well-tended garden, just 150 metres from Kamari Beach. It features self-catered accommodation and free Wi-Fi in public areas. A tavern serving local dishes and a supermarket are at 100 metres.

Simply yet tastefully decorated, all apartments consist of one separate bedroom and a kitchenette with a fridge, 2 cooking rings, kettle and toaster. They are bright and open to a balcony with garden, mountain or Aegean Sea view. Ironing facilities and a hairdryer are included.

Sevi Apartments lies 17 km from Hippocrates International Airport and 42 km from the main town and port of Kos. Free, private parking is available on site.​​

Poi.Name: Sevi Sun 1
Poi.Description:
​Conveniently located 500 metres from the beach and 1 km from the centre of Kos Town, Sevi Sun I offers self-catering accommodation with a private balcony and kitchenette. It includes a large swimming pool and a snack bar.

​Studios at Sevi Sun I are simply furnished with tiled floors. They are all equipped with a mini fridge, electric kettle and cooking rings. The private bathroom features a hairdryer.

Guests can take a refreshing dip in the pool or relax at the sun beds available on the sun terrace. Drinks, fresh juices and light snacks are served at the bar, while continental and full English breakfast is prepared in the morning.

Within just 20 metres from the property, you will find a mini market, where you can buy your daily necessities. At 2.5 km, you can also visit the archaeological site of Asklipeion. Hippocrates Airport is 35 km away. Free Wi-Fi and free on-site parking are provided.​

Poi.Name: Sevi Sun 2
Poi.Description:
​Sevi Sun II is situated 1 km from the main town and port of Kos and 2.5 km from the ancient temple of Asklipeion. It offers apartments with a private balcony overlooking the complex’s pool and has a snack bar.

Sevi Sun apartments feature wooden furnishings and have tiled floors. Each comes with a separate bedroom and a kitchenette featuring a dining table, mini fridge and cooking rings. A hairdryer can be found in the bathroom.

Guests can start their day with a continental or full English breakfast and later enjoy refreshing drinks, coffees and light meals at the snack bar. Sun beds and umbrellas are available around the pool.

The nearest beach is 500 metres away from the property, while 20 metres away you can find a mini market. Kos Airport is 35 km away. Free Wi-Fi is provided on the common areas and free on-site parking is possible.​

Poi.Name: Skoufezis Studios
Poi.Description:
Skoufezis Studios is a complex of 17 Studio apartments.

Each room is 28sqm all spacious, well furnished with telephone, balcony and bath on demand!

The comlex is located in the centre of kardamena, only a minute walk from the sandy beaches where you can enjoy watersports and sunbathing!

For your convenience there is a bar and a reception desk on the ground floor.

The customers can also use the Agrelli pool across the road free of charge!​​

Poi.Name: Sofia Katras Studios
Poi.Description:
Centrally located in Tigaki’s square, 20 metres from the sandy beach, Sofia Katras Studios offers self-catered accommodation. The studios feature a furnished balcony with views of the Aegean Sea.

All air-conditioned rooms are decorated in warm colours and have a TV. Each includes a kitchenette with fridge and cooking rings. Studios Sofia Katras offer a dining area.

Restaurants and shops are within 50 metres from the Sofia Katras Studios. Kos Airport is at 9 km and lively Kos Town is 13 km away. Free public parking is possible nearby the studios.​

Poi.Name: Jeanne & Sarah Isaac
Poi.Description:
Quiet, secluded, hillside cottage. ‘Paradiso”, is a traditional 2 bedroom retreat, set in idyllic location on the island of Kos. It is the perfect place to relax and unwind.

The cottage has spectacular 180-degree views across the Aegean to the island of Kalymnos and is set at the foot of Mount Dikeos with dramatic mountain views.

This charming two double bedroom cottage can sleep up to six people. Fully air conditioned, large sitting room with WIFI and satellite TV. The cottage has been fully renovated to a high boutique standard with tasteful furnishings throughout, including rustic wooden floors, traditional beamed ceilings and original fireplaces.

Fully functioning, charming marble topped kitchen, perfect for entertaining, it includes fridge freezer, ceramic hob cooker, washing machine and air conditioning.

Poi.Name: Dalekos Konstantinos
Poi.Description:
​The apartment is placed in an exceptional environment in an attitude of 100 meters above sea level and 300 meters distance to the beach, overlooking the Kamari bay offering a spectacular panoramic view of Kefalos bay, the Kamari harbour, Nysiros island and the Turkish coast.

The apartment is located in a private residence with garden of 7.000 m² and landscaped swimming pool.

The apartment is located in a building near the owner’s house.

The luxury apartment is at the first floor of the building and facing the south with a terrace offering a spectacular sea view.

Has an inside area of 46m² and a balcony and terrace area of 24m² a total of 70m².

Is designed to accommodate 2 to 3 people.

Sleeps 3: - bedroom: 2 single beds

- living room: 1 single sofabed.

A Mediterranean garden of 5000 square meters in 3 heights.

With more than 200 plants such as cacti, plants and shrubs

Poi.Name: Judy
Poi.Description:
The house comprises of a large lounge (32' LCD TV with basic Sky package), dining area and kitchen plus a separate utility/kitchen room. Therefore there are two cookers, two sinks, a washing machine, dishwasher, microwave and everything is in place for you. Hi speed WI-FI is accessible throughout the house.

Bedroom 1 has a double bed and built in wardrobes (32'LCD TV)

Bedroom 2 has two single beds and built in wardrobes (21' TV)

Bedroom 3 has a 4ft divan/sofa bed that sleeps two persons (14'TV) and built in wardrobes.

Bathroom 1 has a bath, (including shower), toilet and wash basin.

Bathroom 2 has a walk in shower, toilet and wash basin.

There is a large patio at the front of the house with table and chairs and another patio at the rear with a picnic bench.

Poi.Name: Karen Tobin
Poi.Description:
​The Stone Cottage is a traditional Greek house which has been renovated over the last 3 years. 2010 is the first year of renting. It is situated 10 minutes (by car) to Kos Town and 2 km to the nearest resort of Tigaki. Which has one of the best sandy beaches on the island. There are 4 adult and 2 children's bicycles available for use (free of charge).

The cottage comprises of 3 large rooms.

Room 1 is the kitchen and sitting room area together (with fireplace).

Room 2 has a double bed and 2 put-up-beds which can be opened .

Room 3 has two single beds.

There is a large toilet and bath (with shower) and washing machine.

The house is fully insulated with double window panes. Hot water is supplied by solar system or electricity and there is air-conditioning.

The view from the front of the cottage is looking over the owners vineyard to the Aegean sea, with the islands of Pserimos and Turkey in the distance.

The owners live 80m away and are available for any help you may need

Poi.Name: Tassos Kombogiorgas
Poi.Description:
The hostess is a paintress from Belgium, who constructed this paradies in the last 27 years. Her private house, a small restaurant - cafe, an art galery and 3 studios are part of this complex in a wonderful garden, at a quiet, green village, 300 meters above sea level, on Dikeon mountain, on the island of Kos! The studio (40 qm) is on the 1st floor, has sitting area, a table, a double bed, a bathroom, a kitchenette, a big balcony with breathtaking view and a garden! On the walls are hanging paintings painted by the hostess!

At the cafe of Orea Ellas, wich is in the same garden (studio stays secluded and quiet) you can enjoy breakfast, lunch and dinner at special prices.

Poi.Name: Kipriotis Village Resort
Poi.Description: Kipriotis Village Resort is an ideal Village, where architecture and natural beauty, functionality and spaciousness of both outdoor and indoor areas are perfectly combined. The Resort complex is built on a surface of 135.000m2 and is situated on the north east coast of Kos - the isle of Hippocrates, father of medicine – directly on the beach at a distance of only 3km from Kos town and 25km from Kos International Airport. Surrounded by beautifully tended gardens, the hotel complex features an impressive holistic wellness spa centre “ANAVIOSI by Hippocrates Holistic Wellness Spa”, a number of different restaurants, coffee shops and bars as well as a wide range of excellent sport, leisure and entertainment facilities.

Poi.Name: Gaia Garden Hotel
Poi.Description:
This charming, down to earth, hotel is located in the resort of Kos City in a quiet side road called Lambi. It consists of a main house surrounded by several bungalows, all nestling in the beautiful gardens created by the owners. Guests have the pleasure of enjoying this palm filled oasis from the comfort of their own patios.

In the garden area guests will find a freshwater swimming pool, including a children’s pool, surrounded by wooden deckchairs, umbrellas and a pool bar. Guests can also enjoy an aperitif on the poolside terrace which is naturally cooled by the gentle sea breeze. The nearest beach is approximately 500 meters from the hotel and is an organized, sandy beach which also offers some water sports.

For guests who wish to stay active, the hotel also offers basketball, volleyball, tennis, beach volleyball facilities and a gym, all at the disposal of the guests. A regular bus schedule is also in operation which can take guests to and from the main part of Kos City. This small hotel offers hospitality and tranquility in a paradise setting. It is the ideal place to relax and is already attracting its guests back year after year.

Poi.Name: Gaia Village Hotel
Poi.Description:
Located just a short walk from the centre of Tigaki Village and 300 metres from the beach, Gaia Village provides freshwater pools and complimentary continental breakfast.

Surrounded by lush gardens, these cheerful rooms are fully equipped for your holiday needs. After a tasty breakfast in the morning, you can relax in one of the sun beds next to the pool and enjoy the Mediterranean sun.

The excellent location of Gaia Village allows you to be very close to all that Kos has to offer. There are plenty of shops and tavernas nearby and water sport activities at Tigaki Beach. You can also rent a car from the resort to explore this exciting island further and take advantage of the free private parking.

Poi.Name: Gaia Royal
Poi.Description:
Excellently located, just a short walk from the beach and Lido Waterpark, this large resort offers plenty of organised entertainment, large outdoor swimming pools and an all-inclusive package deal.

Gaia Royal has everything you need for a fun, family break in Kos. You can relax on one of the many sun beds around the pools, whilst the children join in the fun and games with the hotel’s animation team. Enjoy a game of tennis on one of Gaia Royal’s large courts or have a quiet stroll to the nearby sandy beach. Relax and enjoy a glass of wine after a day of sunbathing.

Gaia Royal’s provides you with a comfortable base for exploring the rest of the charming island of Kos. Take advantage of the resort’s free private parking and hire a car, or use the nearby local bus, which has excellent links to the centre of Kos. The charming fishing village of Mastichari is also just 5 km away.

Poi.Name: Gaia Palace
Poi.Description:
Gaia Palace is a 5-star hotel, providing luxurious accommodations, deluxe pools and a grand buffet. This modern facility is located in Mastihari, a small traditional fishing village, with panoramic views.

Gaia’s rooms are air conditioned and offer flat screen TVs. Wi-Fi is available for free throughout the entire hotel. All rooms feature deluxe bathrooms with modern fittings.

Guests can take a swim in one of Gaia’s 2 outdoor pools, relax in a shaded terrace or walk through the garden. Inside, the Gaia Palace has a large indoor pool, a modern fitness center and a sauna.

The hotel offers a grand breakfast buffet daily. Guests can enjoy their meals in the outdoor seating area.

The Gaia Palace is located less than 550 yards from the sea and is less than a half hour drive from the historic Myndus Gate and Greek Amphitheater.

Poi.Name: Tigaki's Star
Poi.Description:
Tigaki’s Star is a comfortable family 3*** stars hotel with a capacity of 73 rooms. Situated 300m from Tigaki beach, a famous summer resort of Kos Island with beautiful sandy beach and near a beautiful natural habitat with floral and fauna. On the beach there are water sports and umbrellas with charge.

​

Poi.Name: Lenaki Studios
Poi.Description:
​

A complex of buildings, Lenaki Apartments is located just outside of Kos city centre. It offers a seasonal outdoor swimming pool with sunbeds and umbrellas. All units have a balcony or terrace with pool and mountain views.

Each self-catered apartment includes a satellite TV, refrigerator, kitchenette with kitchenware and a seating area. Air conditioning is available upon request at an extra charge.

Various drinks and snacks can be enjoyed at the on-site snack bar. Restaurants and supermarkets are situated close-by.

The 24-hour reception desk can provide information on local attractions. There is a playground and paddling pool for the younger guests. Free barbecue facilities are accessible.

Lenaki Apartments is a 5-minute walk from the city centre and a 10-minute walk to the beach. It is 27 km from the Kos Airport. Private parking is available on site.​

Poi.Name: Mina Studios
Poi.Description:
​​ Mina Studios are in the centre of Kardamena, close to all the bars, restaurants and nightclubs. The nearest beach is only a short walk away and close to the hotel there is a playground and a pool.

All studios and apartments provide everything needed for a comfortable stay and are cleaned 6 times a week, with sheets and towels changed twice a week.

The rooms feature free air conditioning, free safety box, a kitchenette, television, refrigerator, and balconies.​

Poi.Name: Miros Apartments
Poi.Description:
Situated on the outskirts of Tingaki, opposite a fantastic sandy beach. The Miros Studios are modern and well maintained and offer comfortable accommodation in nice surroundings. Facilities are close by, with tavernas, restaurants and mini markets about a 10 minute walk away. There is a bar and snack bar on site. A warm welcome awaits you from the staff at this family-run complex. You will find a nice pool for adults as well as for children.

Furthermore: Weekly poolside BBQ, Playground area,  Accommodation in Studios (1/3 & 2/4 persons) with twin beds, shower / WC, kitchenette and balcony or terrace. Sunbeds with shade around the pool and also parking area is available.

Poi.Name: Langas Aegean Village
Poi.Description:
Aegean Village is a hotel resort located on the golden sandy shores of the south coast of Kos Island in Greece.It’s layout and use of space is characteristic of the distinctive Aegean architecture, which is apparent in the hotel’s design. Built on a slope, every corner offers magnificent views of the endless deep blue Aegean Sea.

Staying at Aegean Village is a treat for even the most demanding guest, as holidays of quality with high standards are offered. It is the hotel’s objective and priority to offer guests the very best in hospitality, accommodation and services, and it is no wonder that repeat guest levels continue to rise yearly.

The main building lounges, restaurants, bars and facilities are located at the bottom of the slope, while all 330 rooms are situated on the hillside, which are accessed by the 24-hour complimentary mini-bus service.

​

Poi.Name: Grigoriadis Nikolaos G.
Poi.Description: ​Real Estate​

Poi.Name: Parveris Real Estate Kos & associates
Poi.Description: ​Real Estate​​

Poi.Name: TRITON HOTEL
Poi.Description: ​Triton hotel is conveniently located directly across the road from the main beach in the centre of Kos town. Triton has magnificent sea views and is located next door to a peaceful park. It is well known for its warmth hospitality and its staff who will make you feel right at home. Triton is a 3-star hotel, operating from April till October and it has 45 rooms including 3 suites. All rooms are complete with bathrooms, cable tv, mini bar, air conditioning, sound proof triplex glass windows, telephone, internet, parquetry flooring, hair dryer, mini safe, and balcony. In addition, Triton has reception facilities, tv room, coffee bar, small conference room, restaurant and handicapped facilities. Wireless internet is provided free of charge to the rooms and all the hotels areas.​

Poi.Name: AEGEAN HOUSES
Poi.Description:
Only from the entrance of the Aegean Houses hotel you will feel that this hotel is made in such a good taste.

One of the most beautiful hotels in Kos, Aegean Houses is a combination of traditional and modern architecture. 300 metres from the sandy beach, with the comforts of a modern integrated hotel unit and with all the warmth of a personal business made with care, our hotel is an ideal choice for accommodation in Kos. Every place at the Aegean Houses shows bloom, quality, taste and attention to the details.

Poi.Name: Yiannis Apartments and Studios
Poi.Description:
​The Yiannis Apartments are located in Psaldi, only a 15-minute walk from the picturesque harbor in Kos Town. The closest beach is only a 5 minute walk away. 

This family run property offers comfortable accommodations in a friendly environment surrounded by green grounds in a rural semi-residential area. 

Yiannis Apartments are well-equipped, featuring a kitchenette, fridge and balcony or terrace. 

The complex offers an outdoor swimming pool with a large sun terrace. The apartments also have a bar and snack bar.

Poi.Name: The Small Village
Poi.Description:
Location
The Small Village is located on the hills near the sea 500m away, and about 4km outside the village of Mastichari, The Small Village nicely tucked away from the crowds. The airport is 5km away.

Rooms
The ground floor apartment style rooms are large (about 55 sqm)enable to accommodate 2-3 persons and the Maisonettes ( 2bedroom apartments of 85sqm ) can accommodate 4-6 persons They come with a kitchenette,dining area, open plan living room, air conditioning, satellite TV.

Restaurant
The restaurant resembles a village tavern, with the timeless wicker and wood chairs and arranged in an open plan. The glass panels allow nice views of the sea. The menu is Mediterranean.

Exterior
The hotel resembles a small village spread gradually on the hill, surrounded by 20.000 sqm of natural environment. It comprises of 3 neighborhoods with clusters of attached traditional maisonette style buildings in each, resting among gardens and connected by stone paths.

Lobby
The lobby is spacious; guests can inquire about the range of available activities and book their participation at any time. However, modern amenities such as a swimming pool, massage and aroma therapy area, a fitness center are not absent.

General
This is a hotel apart from the rest, it will appeal to those who are looking for an alternative type of holiday and want to learn more about the local culture and the traditional arts and crafts. A rich and real world experience for most, however the hotel also caters for those who just want to relax in an exclusive and well preserved natural environment, as there is no lack of service and amenities. In just 1km distance you can visit the unique replica of an Ancient Greek Settlement– one of the most famous places of interest: “Hippocrates Garden”, where you can experience a journey back to 5th century b.C.

​

Poi.Name: COSTA ANGELA
Poi.Description:
​The hotel is located 5km from the center of Kos with frequent buses and a bus stop in front of the hotel. It has a swimming pool for adults and a smaller size for children. It is 60m from the beach and offers customers free sunbeds for any of the 2 options they prefer.

In the hotel there is a bar and a taverna. The reception offers to the customers 24 hours service. The rooms are either single or double, or triple, overlooking the garden with the swimming pool or the beach, and all have air conditioning, mini bar and hair dryer. In the garden there is a playground, a ping-pong and an amateur football field and enough space for private parking.

Poi.Name: MARILIZA BEACH HOTEL
Poi.Description:
Mariliza Beach Hotel is situated in Marmari, 80 metres from the golden sandy beach. It offers a pool with poolside snack bar, and self-catered rooms with access to the garden.

All studios are simply furnished and include a kitchenette and a spacious patio. A TV and air conditioning are included.

Guests can relax on the sun beds offered around the swimming pool. There is also a TV room, children's pool and a play room with billiards.

The 3-star Mariliza Beach serves a breakfast buffet consisting of homemade delicacies, such as jams, cakes and pies. Home-cooked dishes are served for dinner at the restaurant.
