The centre of Marmari is 15 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Kos Town and the airport are 15 km away, and are easily accessed with regular bus connection. Guests can do windsurfing and kite-surfing on the nearby beach. Free parking is available on site.

Poi.Name: CAMELIA HOTEL
Poi.Description:
​The hotel Camelia is situated in one of the most magnificent islands of the Dodecanese. Kos is considered as the island of Hippocrates - the father of medicine. Our hotel is perfectly located, just 100m from the beach, 400m from the city center, 400m from the old town, 600m from the central port and 700m from the marina.

The Camelia Hotel is a one-star hotel and it provides 22 rooms. All rooms are equipped with modern facilities such as TV set, wireless internet access, refrigerator, bathroom and balcony. Our maid service is available daily to ensure you a comfortable stay. The hotel has also a TV lounge with wireless internet access and a bar where you can enjoy a relaxing drink.

The hotel is ideal for both couples or individual visitors of our beautiful island.
We are really dedicated to make your stay feel like home. We look forward to welcome you in our hotel!

Poi.Name: ATLANTIS
Poi.Description:
​

ATLANTIS hotel is only two kilometers away from the center of Kos town. A bus stop is located right outside the hotel. Visitors have the opportunity to get to the city center in a short time on foot, by bicycle, bus or any other means of transport they wish.

 
Atlantis Hotel is 30 kilometers from the island's airport (30 minutes’ drive) and just 2 km away from the main port of the island (5 minutes’ drive).​

Poi.Name: Horizon Beach Resort
Poi.Description:
Offering absolute elegance and true luxury, Horizon Beach Resort, is distinguished for its friendly environment, its hospitality towards its guests and its high quality of service. Designed with high aesthetics standards, it provides a luxurious yet comfortable atmosphere and becomes a world of discreet sumptuousness, with a distinctive character, created especially for you. It is therefore the ideal destination for those who need to escape from the daily routine, either with friends or with their families.

One of the most modern hotels in Kos, Horizon Beach offers an exceptional standard of accommodation in 260 spacious rooms (some of them with connecting doors) and 64 family rooms, all carefully designed, tastefully decorated and furnished in a contemporary way which combines warmth, comfort and elegance. In the "Asclepios" main restaurant and the "Thalatta" tavern, our team of dedicated chefs offers a wide selection of both traditional and international gourmet cuisine, which our guests may enjoy in an elegant environment, with a magnificent view of the Aegean blue. The particular style and ambience of our main bar, and our "Oasis" snack-pool bars are ideal spots for rest and relaxation, over a wide choice of thirst quenching drinks, inspired cocktails and a variety of dry snacks.
At Horizon Beach Resort, you may swim in the clear blue waters of the Aegean sea in an exceptional sandy beach, or enjoy our two large swimming pools (both with separate children’s pools), which are ideal for outdoor relaxation in the sun. Our sports facilities include beach volley & soccer, tennis, basketball and volleyball courts, a mini soccer (5x5), a fully equipped gym room, as well as a water sports station for windsurfing, kite surfing, catsailing and stand up paddling. The animators of our hotel give their best self for your entertainment. During the day, you can participate in various sports activities (aerobics, beach volley, football, etc). At nights, they perform musical and dance shows, cabaret shows and a lot more. Moreover, parties and live Greek music nights are organized, where you can dance by the pool while reveling in refreshing cocktails.
Multiply awarded by international agencies as one of the most popular hotels worldwide, Horizon Beach Resort is committed to offer our guests an ideal environment to unwind and relax. Enjoy your accommodation in Kos!​

Poi.Name: HOTEL K.ILIOS
Poi.Description:
​

Within 900 metres from the sandy Tigaki Beach in Kos, Ilios Hotel features 2 swimming pools, a hot tub and a restaurant amidst its lush garden. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with a furnished balcony overlooking the swimming pool or the garden.

Featuring tiled floors and wooden furnishings, the studios and apartments of Ilios have a kitchenette with fridge and cooking hobs. Each unit includes a dining area and comes with satellite TV and a hairdryer.

Buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner with Greek and Mediterranean flavours are served at the on-site restaurant. Guests can also enjoy a refreshing drink or a cocktail at the swim-up bar. A mini market with all necessary products is available.

Fitness facilities include a gym and a tennis court. Younger guests can enjoy themselves at the children’s pool and the games room.

Ilios Hotel is located 12 km from Kos Town and 14 km from Hippocrates International Airport. The sandy Marmari Beach is at 5 km. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can arrange car and bicycle rental.

Poi.Name: Manine apartments
Poi.Description:
Situated in the area of Lambi, Manine Apartments is 300 metres away from the beach. It offers self-catering accommodation with air conditioning and it has a swimming pool and a bar.

Bright and spacious, all Manine rooms have a balcony or a patio with views of the pool or the hotel’s garden. Each is fitted with a dining area and a kitchenette with refrigerator and coffee maker.

Guests can have a drink or a snack at the bar of Manine. At 100 metres, they can also find restaurants and traditional taverns.

The centre of Kos main town is 1 km away from the complex. Kos International Airport is within 25 km. Wi-Fi access and on-site parking are provided free of charge.

​

Poi.Name: NATURA PARK VILLAGE
Poi.Description:
The Natura Park Village is, a new 5* stars hotel, established in 2009.  Built in country style, with environment friendly materials, in spacious and well kempt gardens, right on the pebble beach of Psalidi area, only 5 km away from Kos city.

The hotel consists of 23 two-storey blocks of bungalows, which contain ,in total,176 modernly furnished rooms, most of which have   a direct or side view of the south-east Aegean pelagos.

Poi.Name: PHAETHON
Poi.Description:
Hotel is located in the most tranguil and green spot in the center of Kos town. Reception is available to our guests 24hrs a day. Friendly and family atmosphere. Parking availability.

Our rooms offer balcony , air/conditioning , TV , mini bar , telephone.

Poi.Name: ALEXANDRA HOTEL
Poi.Description:
As the tallest building in the city, Alexandra offers amazing views of the harbor, the medieval castle and various city gardens. It is located in the centre of Kos town, 100m from the harbor and 400m from cosmopolitan beaches with exciting water sports. Also close at hand are the castle, the museum and important archaeological sites, as well as merry entertainment at night. Despite its superb central location, the hotel inside is calm and quiet.

The interior of Alexandra Hotel is modern yet classy, the rooms spacious, and the decor contemporary. Its distinguishing feature, however, is the outstanding service, the cleanliness, the hospitality in general. The professionalism and eagerness of the staff create the warm atmosphere that guarantees return visits.

Business guests are assured state of the art conference facilities and all business-friendly amenities.

Poi.Name: Summer village
Poi.Description:
​​Summer Village hotel is located in the area of Marmari and 700m from the sandy beach where you can find water sports and sun beds to rent.

It is 1km from Marmari center, 14 km from the airport and 13 km from Kos town. The bus station for Kos is 100 m from the hotel. In Marmari area you can find bars and restaurants.

All the rooms are all in bungalows style surrounded by beautiful green scenery and they include: Telephone, TV, Air condition, Hair Dryer and fridge.

In hotels garden you can find a big swimming pool, children's pool, football area, beach volley, beach tennis and a very nice cocktail snack- bar. There you can enjoy your drinks, satellite TV, billiard, darts and free wifi.

Reception is open 24 hours a day where you can have information, exchange money, telephone - internet service and also safe box.

Poi.Name: Mastichari Bay Hotel
Poi.Description:
​Built in typical island-style architecture the 4 star Mastichari Bay hotel enjoys a privileged location directly on the beach and just a few steps from the picturesque fishing village of Mastichari at the north of Kos.

Cosy small bungalows, nestled between a unique blossoming garden harmonically create a Mediterranean landscape amongst palm trees and fragrant flowers.

The hotel offers double rooms, studios and apartments as well as 3 swimming pools, 2 restaurants and 2 bars and many facilities to ensure a cozy and relaxing holiday with a Greek flair.

Poi.Name: Lenaki
Poi.Description: Lenaki Apartments are a family run and owned business with high standards of safety and regular maintenance checks. Our apartments are a complex of 5 buildings, 42 self-catering fully furnished rooms, surrounded by beautiful gardens, a large swimming pool as well as a paddling pool for the kids. A grass covered kids playing area next to our pool with swings etc. makes Lenaki Apartments an ideal choice for families. ​Lenaki Apartments are situated just outside Kos City centre, away from larger hotels, noise and the hum drum of passing vehicles but not too far away from the big party that is Kos Town Centre. Bike rental facilities, a large supermarket and a selection of restaurants are all within quick walking distance and the harbour and the main part of town are a mere 15-20 minute walk away.Our rooms are fully furnished with refrigerator, cooking rings, toaster, kettle, pots and pans, cups, fire blankets, notice boards, smokedetectors, air conditioning (on request with additional charge), TV with satellite channels, tiled floors, telephone and stylish decor.

Poi.Name: Anthia Apartments
Poi.Description:
​

It is a very beautiful and well-maintained apartment in the area of Marmari in Kos. It is only 200 meters from one of the most beautiful beaches of the island, the sandy beach of Marmari. Warm, familiar environment, safe and ideal for relaxation.
 All the apartments have  an air-condition  a refrigerator and a full equipped kitchen. From the two balconies every apartment has you can enjoy the sea or the mountains of the delightful village of Zia.

Free wi-fi  at the lobby area.
In the neighborhood you can find restaurants,supermarkets,rent a cars and two surfing centers for those who love surfing.Just outside of the apartments is a bus stop which conect you with Kos town. We also offer transfer from and to the airport and port during day time(09.00a.m-09.00p.m for free.
*Make a request for transport.

Upon request we offer continental  breakfast for 5€.

Poi.Name: COSMOPOLITAN HOTEL
Poi.Description:
A charming 3 stars, Greek family run hotel, the Cosmopolitan has proved popular with all ages seeking comfort and relaxation.

The décor is a warm combination of oak wood and marble, with colorful gardens and lots of attractive touches, enhanced by tropical plants and flowers everywhere.

Cosmopolitan has a large (20m x 10m) swimming pool, a separate children's  swimming pool, 2 lifts, air-conditioning, central heating, Breakfast restaurant, Lobby Bar and a small Tavern by the swimming pool, wide screen Television area with Satellite Channels, Tennis court and tennis equipment, Safety boxes,  Money exchange service and 24 hours reception service.

 All 85 rooms are elegantly decorated with very comfortable wooden furniture, they all have bathroom and balcony, most of them have Sea view and they are all equipped with a music set, TV, Refrigerator, air-conditioning, hairdryer and direct telephone.

We offer free Wi-Fi Internet in all public areas of the hotel.

We offer free parking for our guests within the hotel area.

The hotel is situated 150m from the popular Lambi beach and 1.500m from Kos town centre.

There is a bus stop in front of the hotel, connecting the hotel with the town centre.
Poi.Address: Lambi Beach, Kos Town, 85300 Kos - Greece

Poi.Name: TIGAKI BEACH HOTEL
Poi.Description:
Tigaki Beach Hotel, situated on the most beautiful beach near Kos center, features 170 standard rooms and 78 new superior rooms (as well connecting doors rooms) two floored, in the middle of a beautiful and well - tended garden.

The resort facilities include 4 lifts, reception with parlor, main restaurant, bar, pool-snack bar, taverne on the beach, meeting rooms (max 50 people) TV - room, mini market / boutique / kiosk, children's playground, 2 sweet - water swimming pools ( 1 with Jacuzzi) with garden and sun - terrace, 2 separate children's pool, sun beds and sun - shades at the swimming pools free of charge and at the beach with charge, rent a car, exchange, mail and fax services, parking.

There is regular public transportation to town.

Poi.Name: AEGEON HOTEL
Poi.Description: ​A small family hotel, 50 m from the town center and 100 m from the port.

Poi.Name: PLATANISTA
Poi.Description: This impressive 4 star superior hotel is in a quiet position only 150m from the beach, 2,5km from kos town (frequent local bus service available, as well as easy access by bicycle using the cycle road), 1 km from the marina and 25 km from the airport​

Poi.Name: MARITINA
Poi.Description: ​Famous for its warm hospitality Maritina Hotel is located in the city center of Kos. Fully renovated, complete with handicapped facilities, it is open all year round, offering a restaurant, bar, and a fully equiped conference room. Maritina Hotel has 81 rooms, with TV, air-conditioning, mini bar, hair dryer, parquetry flooring, balcony, telephone. Wireless internet is provided free of charge to the rooms and all the areas of the hotel. As the most commuted and commercialized area, everything a guest needs from the city is at a small walking distance.

Poi.Name: Therma
Poi.Description:
​

Therma are located in the southeastern part of the island, about 13km from the town of Kos.
The landscape has a wild beauty, steep slopes, cliffs and dark pebbles as a result of tectonic disturbances and volcanic eruptions millions of years ago.
  The area takes its name from the hot springs that gush for centuries. These hot spring waters are rich in calcium, potassium, sodium, sulfur and magnesium that are relevant for the healing of skin, arthritic and rheumatic diseases, but also for the aesthetics of the skin. The temperature of the water ranges from 30 to 50 degrees Celsius.
  The experience is invaluable, a natural Spa! In front of the beach has been created a small lake that is separated from the rest of the beach with rocks that allow seawater to enter and cool the hot water. The beach is suitable for all ages and for all seasons.
  You can visit Therma either by bus or by any private means of transport.

Poi.Name: Planet Gym
Poi.Description:
Make exercise part of your daily routine. This gym is fully equipped with advanced gum equipment such as treadmills, steppers and multi-stations for weight gain. It has experienced trainers for group exercise classes with degree in physical education and sports science. All this in very reasonable prices and special offers.

Gym facilities and services include:

  •  Weight and gum machines
  • Group exercise classes (Aerobic/ step, Yoga, Pilates, Abs & Hips training program , TRX suspension training, cross fit, body pump, zumba, kickboxing, hip hop for kids).
  • Power plate/ vibration training
  • Holistic therapies/ massage
  • Sauna
  • Solarium
  • Personal training
  • Diet and nutritional schedule in cooperation with a certified dietitian
  • Supplements dietary
  • Coffee protein and juice, protein bars

Visit the gym to create the ideal fitness program for you. Gym's goal is to show to the client that physical activity is more than just an everyday routine. It can become the most enjoyable part of your daily lives!  ​

Poi.Name: Evexis Fish Spa
Poi.Description: ​The company Evexis Fish Spa is a company that is activated in the space of relaxation and well-being and more specifically in the space of relaxation with specifically fish GARRA RUFA.The company is unique that offers individual aquariums with specifically UV filters for water with ISO certification that ensures the best quality and safety in the use of service.

Poi.Name: Kos Hotel Body n' Soul Spa
Poi.Description:
​A multiplex for sport and relaxation.
Modern fitness center with scientific staff, rooms for group programs and group dances, mini spa, with stimulation and relaxation services for everyone.

Poi.Name: Evexis Fish Spa
Poi.Description: ​The company Evexis Fish Spa is a company that is activated in the space of relaxation and well-being and more specifically in the space of relaxation with specifically fish GARRA RUFA.The company is unique that offers individual aquariums with specifically UV filters for water with ISO certification that ensures the best quality and safety in the use of service.

Poi.Name: Artemis Hamam
Poi.Description: ​Traditional scrub and foam massage, Aromatherapy, Anti-cellulite massage, Anti-stress massage, Medical massage, Four-hand "Artemis" massage, Mud mask, Seaweed mask, Chocolate mask, Facial treatment.​

Poi.Name: Paths in Kos Island
Poi.Description:
Kos is not only the city but the mountainsides too. Routes through the beautiful mountainous nature cut off from the rest of civilization overlooking the island and the Aegean. Starting from the town of Kos you can choose either the trail that passes through the village of Platani near the Asclepion of Kos, or the route that passes by the mountain Sympetro and the wildlife shelter. Common destination:  Asfendiou district and the beautiful Zia!
The distance for the route from Kos town to Asfendiou is around 10 km and you can travel it by car or bicycle and the second route, until you reach the wildlife sanctuary, is 13 km and you can travel it with mountain bike or on foot, since the car is extremely difficult to go through the treacherous canyon roads there. For the second route that goes through the shelter you should pay attention as at some point it is so difficult that it is also called "Calvary." One of these routes also lead to “Piso Therma”.
You have to be careful with these Routes since the road is bumpy in most of them. Always carry a map with you so you can travel through the gravel and asphalt roads. It is also important to bring along plenty of water and maybe food, since long distances under the sun can cause dehydration.

Poi.Name: Routes in Kefalos
Poi.Description:
The routes in Kefalos are amazing, with wonderful views and lead to places you might have never seen before. Starting from the village of Kefalos, you can go to Agios Theologos with the beautiful sunset or choose the other route that leads to the Cave of White Stone, Kastelli and the heavenly beach, as its name suggests, Cavo Paradiso.
The distance is 5.7 kilometers to Agios Theologos, 5 km to the Cave of White Stone, about 4.5 miles to Kastelli and 10 km to Cavo Paradiso. These routes can be traveled by jeep, by bike or for the more adventurous by feet.

You have to be careful with these Routes since the road is bumpy in most of them. Always carry a map with you so you can travel through the gravel and asphalt roads. It is also important to bring along plenty of water and maybe food, since long distances under the sun can cause dehydration.

Poi.Name: Route το Piso Therma
Poi.Description: The route towards “Piso Therma” is ideal for some, as it is along the beach. It starts from Therma and ends in “Piso Therma” and can be traveled only by feet, since at some point you might have to put your feet into the sea!

Poi.Name: Route to Marmari
Poi.Description:
The ideal route for sea and fitness lovers. What is better than doing your workout with the bike and when you are tired, dive in the sea and take a rest in the splendid beaches you will encounter along the way! On this route you will find many bars, either in Tigkaki or Marmari or at some point between these settlements.
The route starts from the Kos town and after going through the beach Karnagio, arrives in the village of Tigaki. There you can make a stop to cool off in a cafeteria or have a lunch in a local restaurant and continue to the final destination, Marmari.
The road is paved but with limited traffic, but nevertheless it would be good to be careful the passing vehicles.

Poi.Name: Route to Kefalos
Poi.Description: The route towards Kefalos is another one that you will find many beaches along the way to make a dive, as long as you explore the roads leading to the northern side of Kos. This route starts from Mastihari or Antimachia, ends at the residential road towards Kefalos and has a length of about 10 km. So, you can, after your breakfast in a hotel in Mastihari or your visit to the local museum of Antimachia to follow the route either on your bike or your vehicle. You have to be careful, since most of the route is dirt road, and it would be good to have with you a refreshing drink on the hot summer days.

Poi.Name: Bicycle Routes
Poi.Description:
Kos is regarded as the island of bicycle. This is because the routes that you can take are endless and there are bicycle paths throughout the city to facilitate your ride. You can start by bicycle from Lambi and end up in Agios Fokas, a distance of almost 11 km!
The bicycle paths of Kos start from the sandy beach of Lambi and reaches the busy street of Kanari. From there you can continue towards the port and go along it until you reach Psalidi or go into the center of Kos. In this way you can make your ride and admire the historic buildings until you find a café, restaurant, bar or even a cloth and souvenir shop that suits you. If you want to make a dive, you will definitely find the right beach during your ride.

Poi.Name: Municipal Stadium Antagoras
Poi.Description: ​Municipal Stadium Antagoras with soccer field.

Poi.Name: Antimachia Basketball Court
Poi.Description: ​Antimachia Basketball Court.

Poi.Name: Zipari Basketball Court
Poi.Description: ​Zipari Basketball Court.

Poi.Name: Pyli Basketball Court
Poi.Description: ​Pyli Basketball Court.

Poi.Name: Zipari Soccer Field
Poi.Description: ​Zipari Soccer Field.

Poi.Name: Kefalos Soccer Field and Basketball Court
Poi.Description: ​Kefalos Soccer Field and Basketball Court.

Poi.Name: Pyli Soccer Field
Poi.Description: ​Pyli Soccer Field.

Poi.Name: Antagoras New Stadium
Poi.Description: ​Αthletics field, soccer field and gym.

Poi.Name: Kos Indoor Gym
Poi.Description: ​Indoor gym with basketball court.

Poi.Name: Fitness Village Gym
Poi.Description:
​In this fully equipped gym, you will find what you need to do your workout, whether you want to build muscle, or stay in shape.

It is located in a very good position in the coastal side of the island.

Poi.Name: Davids Fitness Club
Poi.Description: ​In Kos will find the modern gym of David. You can do any kind of exercise and get tips from David, the coach of the international reputation Bodybuilder Mike Kefalianos.

Poi.Name: Center of Therapeutic -Athletic Horse Riding Kos
Poi.Description:
Is a place in Marmari - Kos that gives the opportunity to children and adults to come in contact with horses and to live the unique experience of horse riding on the beach. Marmari has the most beautiful sandy beach and sunset in kos.

Center facilities are suitably organized to adjust to the needs of children and adults (wc,play ground, garden lounge). There is a little lake with gold fish and ducks near the garden lounge and a vegettable garden, chickens, goats, sheeps and rabbits. Center horses are trainned strictly by the English and German rules of Horse Riding.

Erika Mastorou is the trainner and the owner of the farm, member of HETI(FRDI) and Lisanced in therapeutic riding, horse riding and vaulting.

WORKING HOURS: Monday- Saturday  9 - 13:00 & 17:00 - 21:00

Poi.Name: Alfa - Horse
Poi.Description: ​Alfa-Horse is owned by a German couple settled on Kos Island in 2002 after a long period of being just holidaymakers on the beautiful island of Kos. All the horses were been trained in Germany, the ponies came from pony stables in Niedersachsen. Alfa-horse offers only trained and reliable horses and ponies for our riding guests. Even we brought well fitted saddles only for all of our horses. The riding equipment is new and is hold in excellent condition. It is offered proofed riding caps for adults and children.

Poi.Name: Rafaels Trail Riding
Poi.Description:
​The stables are located close to the Sovereign Beach hotel - easily accessed by public transport, a short taxi ride or an enjoyable stroll. They look forward to introducing their horses to you, carefully selected to ensure that you will get as much enjoyment from them as they do.
Rafaels Trail Riding offers group horse riding for all levels, semi-private riding for couples or small private groups or private one to one tuition.

Poi.Name: Salt Lake Stables
Poi.Description: ​​Salt Lake Stables is part of a family owned and run sheep and horse breeding farm located between the villages of Tigaki and Marmari on the west shore of the salt lake. It is Situated 150 meters from the beach

Poi.Name: Kos Riding Club
Poi.Description: ​The riding school "Ippikos Omilos Ko" is open throughout the year offering the opportunity to try various equestrian sports, such as dressage and jumping. It's available for all ages.

Poi.Name: Ten Pin Bowling
Poi.Description: ​An open space in which children and grown-ups can have fun, playing bowling with their friends or family, while enjoying a drink or coffee.

Poi.Name: Mini Golf Kos
Poi.Description: ​Mini Golf for kids and adults in Kos Psalidi with 16 circuits of different level.

Poi.Name: Paintball Arena
Poi.Description: ​In Lambi of Kos, raise your adrenaline levels while playing with your friends paintball, in a well-designed exterior field.

Poi.Name: Kos Tennis Club
Poi.Description: ​Summer moments with joy and exercise in the camp of Kos Tennis Club

Poi.Name: Marmari Go-Kart Center
Poi.Description:
Marmari go-kart center is a family run business, located on the island of Kos between Tigaki and Marmari near the salt lake and has been running for over 20 years on Kos island. Marmari go-kart center is fully insured by the reputable insurance company of Allianz and thus all drivers on our track are fully covered at all times.

There are various types of karts available to suit all tastes and ages. For toddlers (3 to 6 years of age) there are small battery operated electric karts. There is a specially created track, isolated from the main go-kart track for the added safety of visiting toddlers. For young visitors (6 to 9 years of age) there are mini-karts available and the rest can choose form standard 4-stroke karts.

Poi.Name: Go Kart Kardamena
Poi.Description:
​Go-Karts in the beautiful Kardamena can promise you eventful day, where there is a brand new track and new all go-karts.
There are even doubles so you can take your company with you. All Go-Karts are 200cc and over models. Toddlders can even join in the fun as there several mini Go-Karts as well.

Poi.Name: Psalidi Go Karts
Poi.Description: ​Go Kart track in Psalidi

Poi.Name: IOANNIS PAPAVASILIOU MD
Poi.Description:
​PROVIDER OF PRIMARY MEDICAL CARE FOR ACUTES OR CHRONIC DISEASES OF THE MUSCULOSKELETAL SYSTEM-

OSTEOPOROSIS

Poi.Name: Ridekos
Poi.Description: ​Mountain Bike Activities

Poi.Name: Tigaki
Poi.Description:
Tigaki beach is located at the homonymous village, approximately 11 kilometers from the city of Kos and extends to a distance of 10 kilometers all the way up tp the Alyki.

The golden sand and the shallow waters make this beach very attractive for a large number of tourists and especially for the children.

The beach has received more than once the Blue Flag award, not just for the quality of its waters but also for the level of services offered.

Surf lovers will enjoy the high waves at a small distance from the beach. And those interested in starting out with water sports can can find a water sports instructor in Tigaki.

Access from the city of Kos is easy using a local bus, a car or even a bicycle along the beach road from Lampi.​

Poi.Name: Lampi
Poi.Description:
One of the busiest beaches of the island, very popular thanks to its position, close to the city center. It is located on the west side of Kos town and basically it is its continuity.

Here the visitor encounters 1 kilometer of beautiful sandy beach from one side and lush greenery on the other. Lampi has won Blue Flag for its clean water, but also for the number of services offered.

Suitable for everyone, families, couples and groups covering all desires. Along the road  one encounters beach bars, malls water sports, and facilities for beach volley. During the day, it offers visitors the opportunity to relax, enjoy any of the many beach bars, but also exercise dabbling in water sports. But in the evening no one is 'sleeping' continuing at a high pace, with several bars and restaurants.

To get to Lambi one can take your bike on the bicycle path on the coastal side of Kos, but also choose a private vehicle or one of the local buses.

Poi.Name: Limnionas
Poi.Description:
Although the winds blowing from the north side of the island are strong, the sea of Limnionas has no waves, since it is located in a small artificial bay. There, you will find golden sand and crystal clear waters to make your dive, and a restaurant to enjoy your food.
Limnionas beach is located on the northern side of the island near Kefalos and you can go there with your vehicle from the village of Kefalos or from the provincial road.

Poi.Name: Marmari
Poi.Description:
Marmari Beach is sandy with lovely blue sea. Organized for those who want to avoid the sun and relax on a sun lounger, there are spots to sunbathe and avoid the hassles. The beach provides many opportunities for water sports and is suitable for Kite Surfing, offering ideal conditions. Marmari has bars and restaurants, but also a small port where small boats can anchor.

The beach is located 15 kilometers west of the city of Kos, named after its village. It is accessible by car, bike, taxi or by regular local bus service.

Poi.Name: Mastixari
Poi.Description:
Mastihari beach gives the impression that you are in some exotic place. In some places it is organized, but those who are satisfied without a lounger, may well lie with the towel on the sand, tucked away along the beach and enjoy the sunset.

Besides the organized water sports, the beach  is ideal for wind-and kite surfing. Those who want to have fun with their children can visit the nearby amusement park water games "Lido".

The beach Mastihari located near the settlement of Antimachia, 22 km west of Kos, a continuation of Marmari beach.

If you do not have your own vehicle, you can get there by taxi or bus from the town of Kos or through Antimachia and Mastihari

Poi.Name: Faros
Poi.Description:
This sandy beach of Faros is perpetually stormed by large waves, due to the prevailing strong winds. It is organized, with many hotels and rooms . The beach owes its name to the lighthouse located nearby. It is the continuation of the beach of Lambi and spans three kilometers to the west.

To reach it one may follow the bicycle path that runs from the port and ends at the of the Lighthouse. Also, you can use the bus or your own vehicle

Poi.Name: Psalidi
Poi.Description:
The beach is mainly composed of pebbles and is in many places organized. At one point there is a creek where you can indulge in kite surfing, if you have the right equipment. organized water sports clubs with wind surfing, water ski and more can also be found . If you get hungry, you can enjoy fresh fish, Greek and European cuisine in taverns across the main strip.

The beach of Psalidi is near the town of Kos, on the road leading to Agios Fokas and Therma.

You can reach Psalidi by bus, taxi, rented car or even bicycle.

Poi.Name: Katerina
Poi.Description:
​

The best day of your holidays!

Travel with Katerina and learn about 3 traditional islands. The ship starts every day from Kos harbor at 10 a.m. and returns about 6 p.m.

The first island is Platti where the ship stays for 1:30 h, you can go swimming and snorkeling in the clear blue of Aegean sea. After swimming a BBQ lunch is served on board. This is included in the price. Second island is Kalymnos witch is known as the sponge island. You can visit the sponge factory or walk around the town of the island, Pothia. On the departure traditional donuts are served. The last stop is Pserimos where you can swim to a sandy beach. On board is served cool watermelon. After Pserimos the sails are raised and the adventure begins.​

Poi.Name: Horizon Surfing
Poi.Description:
​Windsurfing lessons, school and rental.

Kitesurfing lessons, school and rental.

Catamaran, S.U.P and Yoga.

Poi.Name: WATER-PROOF Surf & Sail & Kite
Poi.Description:
Water-proof at Mastihari offers windsurfing, kitesurfing, catamaran and sailing both for beginners and advanced.

School and rental.

Poi.Name: Paradise Beach
Poi.Description:
The name of this beach predisposes the visitor for what you will encounter: a truly heavenly landscape. A sandy beach about 6 km, crystal icy waters, a landscape with a backdrop of lush cedar hills composes a paradise!

Really organized, it offers the visitor whatever he may wish. Here one can relax and enjoy swimming, but also have fun doing water sports. When it's lunch time, one may enjoy fresh fish and local dishes at one of the nearby restaurants.  A beach, not to  be missed.

The beach is accessible by bus or just following the road to Kefalos.

Poi.Name: Arian diving Center
Poi.Description:
​The Arian Diving Centre has been established in Kos, the beautiful Greek island, and through extensive professionalism has managed to gain an international reputation.
The Diving Centre is located in Kardamena, a short walk from many of the hotels, shops, banks, bars/restaurants and any other services you might require. Kardamena is a village located 30 kilometres from Kos town and 5 kilometres from "Hippocrates" International Airport.

Poi.Name: GUST windsurfing
Poi.Description:
​GUST! Windsurfing School Kos is located in Kardamena, in the south coast of the greek Island of Kos. Just on the beach of the Portobello Royal Hotel.
It is equipped with NAISH windsurfing sails and boards, as well as HOBIECAT 15 catamarans.

It offers:
Windsurfing lessons, rental and storage.
Catamaran lessons, rental and trips.
SUP rental.
Kitesurfing lift.
Kids lessons.
Groups and family deals.
Lessons in English, Italian, German, Russian and Greek.
You can book your lesson or rental online, to be sure you have your equipment or instructor exactly when you need it.
A free transfer is also available from your hotel or apartment in the Kardamena area.

Poi.Name: Cavo Paradiso
Poi.Description:
Perhaps the most isolated beach in Kos, Cavo Paridiso lies hidden in the island's southern tip, about half an hour from the village of Kefalos. It's a magical place, with crystal clear waters and fine golden sands that make up an exotic scenery unique to the Aegean.

Cut off from the busy life of the island, the beach is perfect for a relaxing and peaceful day. Partially organized, there is enough room for those wishing to create their own atmosphere.

In order for the beach to beach reached, one must be lead through the backroad of Kefalos and follow it until the asphalt gives way to a dirtroad.

Poi.Name: Agios Theologos
Poi.Description:
One of the most remote beaches, named after the small chapel of St. John the Theologian Located just meters away from the shore.

The scenery you encounter is unique. A rocky coast with numerous bays that creates a sense of isolation, perfect for endless hours of sunbathing. Water sports enthusiasts love this beach because of the gentle waves, perfect for windsurfing.

The beach is not organized, so it is useful to equip oneself with the necessities. If you forget, there is a nearby traditional restaurant where you can taste delicious traditional dishes.

Agios Theologos is on the other side of the island, about seven kilometers west of the village of Kefalos. Driving there, watch the many sharp turns.

Poi.Name: Agios Stefanos
Poi.Description:
One of the most photographed beaches. It combines the beauty of nature with important historical sites such as the ruins of early Christian churches, which are just a few meters from the sea. The beautiful landscape is completed by Castri, a small rocky island, with diameter of 50 meters, just across the middle of the Gulf from where the small chapel of St. Nicholas emerges.

Well organized, with large numbers of visitors, it offers several amenities and a variety of water sports.

The beach of Agios Stefanos is about 3 km Northeast of the village of Kefalos.
 
To visit it you can follow the road leading out of the village Kefalos and turn right to the road that descends down to the beach.

Poi.Name: Agios Fokas
Poi.Description:
Proud holder of the "Blue Flag" award , the beach of Agios Fokas combines white and black sand with beautiful pebbles. It is approximately 8 km away from the town of Kos and just 2 kms away from the Therma beach. Offers several organized spots with umbrellas, infrastructure for water sports and  the Beach Bar Agios Fokas. Those who are looking for a quiet spot to enjoy the beautiful scenery are sure to find it along this beautiful beach.

You may reach Agios Fokas by using buses, taxis, your vehicle, and bicycle.

Poi.Name: Kamari
Poi.Description:
The main beach of Kefalos, Kamari, is one of the most famous beaches of the island. Sizable of length, it borders and carries on the beach of  Limnionas. It is about 1 km away from the the village and about 40 km from the town of Kos.

The blue and cold waters are ideal for hot summer days. Easily accessible and well organized, Kamari can cover the needs of all guests. One may can enjoy swimming and the sun, but also invigorate his adrenaline by trying one of the many water sports. All along the beach runs a line of  cafes and traditional taverns designed to meet the needs of even the most demanding palate!

Access is easy, either with one of the frequent bus routes, or by private vehicle. Biking for the more adventurous, is always an option.

Poi.Name: Karnagio
Poi.Description:
Karnagio is a sandy beach where the sea deepens slowly and so is often visited by families. It is the ideal destination for those seeking tranquility. The beach is unorganized, such it is advisable to for one to carry along basic supplies such as water, food and maybe an umbrella for some shade.

The beach is located between the beach Tigaki and Lambi, about 5 km from the town of Kos. You can reach it following the road leading from Lambi in Tigkaki in a vehicle or, better yet, by bike. It is accessible for the most part, but it would be good to beware, because along the beach, the road is littered with sand.

Poi.Name: Kohilari
Poi.Description:
A sandy beach, cut off from the other beaches of Kefalos ,situated in the north side of the village. It  is ideal for wind surfing and kite surfing on the high waves created  by strong wind blowing ever-furious in the area. For those who do not engage in Kite Boarding but want to learn, one will find there one of the many schools of Kos’ Kite boarding, t Kohilari Kite Center.

The small beach Kochylari is located just outside the village of Kefalos, approximately 5 km away from it. To get there, turn right on the junction, just before the path to Kefalos.

Poi.Name: Therma
Poi.Description:
The Therma also known as empros thermens are situated in the southeastern corner of the island 13 kilometers away from the town.

The scenery is characterized by a wild beauty of deep gulches, rocks and black pebbles, the result of tectonic discord, and volcanic eruptions millions of years ago.

The area was christened after the hot springs that have been present there for centuries. The waters reputably bear healing properties as they are rich in potassium, calcium, magnesium, sulfur and sodium, elements considered instrumental in cures for skin arthritic or rheumatic diseases. The temperature of the waters hovers between 30-50 Celsius.

The experience of bathing in this natural Spa is invaluable. In the forefront of the beach a pod has been made, surrounded by rocks, allowing the seawater in, cooling the hot waters.

The Therma can be visited by bus or by any private means of transportation.

Poi.Name: Kos Marina
Poi.Description:
​

Your natural, secure bay. We will make sure that your stay in Kos Marina is worth every moment of your precious time.   KOS MARINA has officially opened on the 15th of May 2001. Since then high quality services are offered to our guests.

It is located next to KOS island old harbour, the heart of Dodecanese islands, Aegean Sea, Greece, the most charming resort in Greece and the best sailing & cruising area in Europe!

Kos Marina came under the management of KOS Ependitiki SA (a company owned by the Municipality of KOS town) in 1999. Since then 8 million euros was invested, applying the ambitious program of building the best Marina in the Aegean Sea! Two years later Kos Marina was ready to offer an extensive range of services to yachts from 7 to 50 meters.

Kos Marina premises are patrolled 24 hours by guards. Cameras cover all over the complex Kos Marina. Fire Precaution. All piers are equipped with fire stations with fire extinguishers; alarm system; fire hoses with both fresh and seawater circuit. All piers are equipped with emergency stations comprising lifebuoys, lifelines, emergency telephones and rescue ladders.

Pilot speedboat, WC-showers, Trolleys, Parking Lot, Bilge pump out, Sewerage pump out, Waste oil disposal, Refuse containers, Fuel station.

Administration Building with Reception, Authorities, Info centre, Meeting room & Guests' Suites. Weather report, Internet, telephone and facsimile services are offered in the Marina's Info Centre, where meetings and events can be organized. Bank ATM, Baggage storage and Postal services are available.

Shopping center with Cafeteria-bistro, Restaurant, Super Market, Fruits Market, Laundry, Yachts Chandlers Shops, Safety Equipment, Souvenirs shops, Boutique, Rent a car, Yacht Brokers, Yachting & Travel Agencies.

Marina entrance: 36° 53' N 27° 18' E
VHF channel: 77
Call sign: Kos Marina.
Working hours: 07:00 to 22:00 (Monday to Sunday)

Poi.Name: Marinos Marine Center
Poi.Description:
Unit parking, security, maintenance and engineering support yachts
Marinos Marine Center​ company offers portability of your boat in a specially designed parking on our premises.
The company offers portability of your boat in a specially designed parking.
Marinos Marine Center has been organized so as to serve each customer, from the most fanatic to the casual hobbyist. Besides parking and launching the boat, we offer cleaning (in the hull, the balloons and on the deck) and maintenance (engine or other sign). All that's left to you is to engrave course and enjoy your trip.

Reproduces the mechanical support of your machine, with excellent organization and complete equipment, but also an organized network of partners,  you'll enjoy your boat like never before.
Marinos Marine Center has a fully equipped workshop and marine use original spare parts of all companies and marine lubricants.

​

Poi.Name: Kardamena water sport Center
Poi.Description:
Kardamena Water Sports Center is the biggest beach entertainment operation in Kos Island, Greece, and one of the largest in the whole country.

Based in Kardamena village, on the south side of Kos island, it serves the Main Beach, Banana Beach and 8 hotels (Porto Bello Royal, Porto Bello Beach, Aegean Village, Louis Helios Beach, Sovereign Beach, Kalimera, Kalimera Mare and Akti) from 7 distinct beach stations.

They have been offering joy and excitement in a wide variety of water sports activities with safety for 19 years!

Poi.Name: Kardamena
Poi.Description:
In the village of Kardamena you will find a sandy beach well organized, with plenty of sun beds and umbrellas. There are many water sport facilities along the beach, and if you do not want to stray far away to eat, you will definitely find a nearby restaurant that suits your taste. You will also find many beach bars and cafes where you can relax whilst overlooking the beautiful sea.

The beach is located in the village of Kardamena, about 25 kilometers from Kos town and 7 km from the airport.

Poi.Name: Vertatoria - Happy Kite
Poi.Description: The centre offers facilities for all kinds of kiterboarders. Lessons with English, Russian, & Italian speaking instructors, rental of newest equipment - RRD - all range, IKO certificates, chill-out, sweet water, Wi-Fi Internet. Located at the beautiful village Kefalos - 20 minutes far away from Kos airport.

Poi.Name: Paradise WaterSports
Poi.Description:
Paradise Watersports is located directly beneth the snack bar in Paradise Beach, near the bubble beach and offers:

Jet Ski, Parasail, Fly Fish, Ringo, X-Ring, Banana, WaterSki, Wakeboard, Pedalo, Crazy Sofo.

Poi.Name: Mikes Chatzidakis
Poi.Description: ​Water Sports​.

Poi.Name: Plori Water Sports
Poi.Description: ​Bannana, Rigo, Water sky, Jet Sky, Pedalo, handmade umbrellas!

Poi.Name: Kefalos Windsurfing and Sailing
Poi.Description:
​A warm and friendly welcome from Jens and his Team awaits you at Kefalos Windsurfing and Sailing Center on Kos. The center has been at Kefalos Bay for more than 20 years – and still going strong!
The center is stocked with F2/Patrik Diethelm boards and North Sails and will be changed every year. The center pride itself on the condition and variety of equipment on offer.

Poi.Name: Kohilari Kite Center
Poi.Description:
​The sandy beach is about 5 km wide, shallow water and a strong northern wind who assures you loads of fun on the water.
If you are new to the sport, Kite Center will give you the chance after few lessons to be able to do your first jump… For experts there is a large choice of equipment which you can rent to enjoy your hobby.
The strong ‘Meltemi’ wind blows all summer long, side-on shore and 15- 25 knots gives you the ideal power for action.
With all new and latest equipment, state of the art kites and boards, the center is ready to guide you in action.

Poi.Name: Water Club
Poi.Description: ​In Water Club will find all the water sports that might interested you. Situated at Paradise Beach in Kefalos.

Poi.Name: Baywatch
Poi.Description: Baywatch has 25 years of operation and offers a lot of water sports such as parasailing and jet ski.

Poi.Name: Lido Water Park
Poi.Description:
Lido Water park is located in the Mastichari area (25km distance from Kos town center), occupies an area of 75.000 square meters and is one of the largest water parks in Greece.

Within the park you can find a wide variety of water slides, water games and service facilities such as restaurants, snack bars, coffee bars, first aid area, lockers and a mini-market. Specially trained lifeguards stand-by to ensure the safety of visitors in swimming pools and water slides. The water of each single pool is renewed daily, making our facility one of the most modern in Europe.

- See more at: http://www.lidowaterpark.com/en/the-park/in-a-nutshell#sthash.ysXkESo5.dpuf

Poi.Name: Daily Cruises Kos - Kalymnos Cruises Union
Poi.Description:
From Kos port daily cruise to 3 islands.
Plati- Kalymnos - Pserimos: 10:00 - 17:30.
Vathy - Plati- Pserimos: 10:00 - 17:30.
Visit the sponge factory in Kalymnos.
Swimming and snorkeling in a private bay.
Relax on the beautiful beach of Pserimos.

Evening party cruise: 21:00 - 23:00.
Beer cruise: 21:00 - 23:00.
Day cruise to Plati and Pserimos: 11:00 - 17:30.
Evening cruise to Plati and Pserimos: 15:00 - 20:00.

Enjoy an unforgettable experience cruising on our beautiful Greek islands.

Poi.Name: Yacht and Sailing Rental offices
Poi.Description: ​Yacht and Sailing Rental offices inside Marina at the city of Kos.

Poi.Name: Imperial Kos Windsurfing and Watersports Club
Poi.Description:
Welcome to the Imperial Water-sports and Windsurfing Club. The club is situated at the 5 star Grecotel Kos Imperial on the beautiful Greek island of Kos in the resort area of Psalidi.

Kos is an ideal place for various water-sports and windsurfing. Imperial Water-sports and Windsurfing club provides a large variety of activities designed to keep you in the water while having loads of fun and you do not have to be a resident at the hotel to be able to join in the water activities.

So no matter what your age or skill and irrespective if you're looking for hard, skill-improving sports action or just looking to spend your holiday having fun in the sea, whether you're after a windsurfing or water-skiing session or if you prefer some laid back canoeing, then you've found the right place to be.

Poi.Name: Windzone Surf Club
Poi.Description: ​The club is located at a point where the famous Meltemi blows every day and it's ready to offer enjoyment to all surfing fans, at an absolutely stunning beach in the area of Psalidi near Kos Town. The club was created by 2 friends who wanted their dream to become reality. At a peaceful environment you can truly enjoy the rides on the surfing boards no matter what your surfing skills is. Enjoy windsurfing and kitesurfing with all your heart in picturesque Greece with the infinite blue sky as a background.

Poi.Name: Helona
Poi.Description:
​Helona Beach is a magical beach, 4 km away from Kos Kardamena.

With golden sand and blue waters the beach is a typical beach someone can find on the island. For the most part of it, it is organized with sunbeds and umbrellas, but there are places along the beach where you can lie down on the sand. Further away,  there are many restaurants to dine.

From Kardamena you can find it if you follow with your vehicle the road going to the west, along the beach.

Poi.Name: Odyssey
Poi.Description:
​Three Islands. Visit at the sponge factory in Kalymnos.

Swimming and norkeling in private Bay.

Relax at the Beautiful beach of Pserimos.

Lunch Included.

Poi.Name: Nisyros
Poi.Description:
​The small and picturesque isle of Nisyros, inhabited by 1000 people in the south of Kos, offers options for entertainment, good food and relaxation. 

The monastery of Panagia Spiliani found on an overlook above Mandraki, the capital of the island celebrates on the 9th of August through the 15th when the pinnacle of the festivities is reached. Nisyros became famous due to its volcano, boasting a great crater going by the name Stefanos, monopolizing touristic interest, as one of the few remaining hydrothermal craters of the world. Small boats make their way to Nisyros from the port of Kardamena and Kos. The time spent traveling will not surpass 2 hours in either case, with the main port of the island being the one furthest away. The visitor may return to Kos on the same day or spend the night in one of the hotels or studios of the isle.​

Poi.Name: Kalymnos
Poi.Description:
​To the north of Kos Island lies Kalymnos. The profession of the sponger intertwined itself with the identity and character of the islanders of Kalymnos to this day, granting the island its nickname the isle of the spongers. With a population of 18.600 men its is one of the most densely populated islands of Greece, and its history is tied to legends and adventures of the sea. Its physical beauty can be compared solely to the islands cuisine. 

Known for its excellent food Kalymnos is ideal for fish eaters. Most of the taverns operate using solely fresh fish except for that one may try local specialties like maouri. Also of note is are the numerous historical sites of the island, like the castle of the Village, were the islanders took refuge in case of pirate raids. 13 churches can be found, all maintained in pristine condition. You may visit Kalymnos through small boats, taking to the water from Mastichari and reaching Kalymnos within 30 minutes. A catamaran leaving from the main port will take you to the island in 45 meters.​

Poi.Name: Leros
Poi.Description:
​Leros is the island of goddess Artemis, north of Kos beside Kalymnos. Leros populated by 8.000 people, mostly left to its own devices Leros is a virgin island of natural beauty and total harmony. Littered with many restaurants and cafeterias from its largest village of Agia Marina to its smaller settlements, Leros offers great food. Worthy of admiration, the small one or two story houses are ordered in such a manner as two create picturesque, narrow streets. 


During the summer months Leros is host to many cultural happenings in the settlements of Platanos and Laki, capable of drawing a visitor's attention with festivities and local musical and dancing companies. 

 
One of the sights of the island the Mpellenis tower built between 1925-1927, a manor of the time, is now houses the war museum of the island. 

One may travel to Leros from either Kos or Kalymnos within 2 hours and 50 minutes respectively.​

Poi.Name: Patmos
Poi.Description:
​Patmos on the northwest horizon of Kos is home to 3.000 souls. A religious center of international interest due to the Spilaion of Apocalypses, were according to Christian tradition the rock was cut in three symbolizing the Holy trinity, by the echo of God's voice transmitting to John the evangelist the text of the Revelation. 

Patmos is an alternative to the usual vacations offered in the Aegean, combining natural beauty to modest touristic development. In Patmos the visitor will find all that is necessary for a pleasant stay as the islands bears every contemporary traveling infrastructure. Daily 3 hour long trips to Patmos are offered through the port of Kos.​

Poi.Name: Alikarnassos or Bodrum
Poi.Description:
​From Kos town one has the opportunity of leaving Greece completely. Bodrum on the shores of Turkey (ancient Alikarnassos) has a population of 35.000, who saw their little fish village being transformed to a resort of international caliber. Traditional tea, kebabs and Kazan ntipi are some the tastes one may savor during his shopping break. Of the many monuments, the castle stands outs, an imposing guardian on the ports facade built by the knights of Saint John, a twin to the fortress of Neratzia. One may reach Bodrum through small boats every morning and noon, taking one to two hours to reach their destination. 

The usual scheduled departures from the port are not the only means of reaching the outlying destinations. One might prefer one of the small boats offering food and drink on the trip, or visit Pserimos and Plati alternatively. For the more capricious, the option of renting a yacht is at all times available.​

Poi.Name: Pserimos
Poi.Description: ​Pserimos extends over a surface of 15 km2, counts approximately 150 inhabitants, and is ideal for truly peaceful holidays. In the island they have discovered traces of an ancient settlement, which some archaeologists tend to identify with the town of Perraiotan. In the west side of the island, there is a small island called Plati, a part of which forms a separate rock-islet, named Nekrothiki. All the coasts are ideal for swimming, with the most exceptional one being the Vathy bay. Pserimos is located 6 n.m. SE away from Kalymnos island.

Poi.Name: Plati
Poi.Description: ​Plati is a tiny island seperated from Pserimos by 500m of water shoaling to a depth of 5m. There is little to see except for a small chapel but it has pleasant swimming in aquamarine seas and diving from 5m cliff overhangs.

Poi.Name: Tropical Sails Yacht Charter
Poi.Description:
Welcome to Tropical Sails, Yacht Charter & Day Sailing in Kos.

Based in Kos Island Tropical Sails offer for bare - boat and crewed yacht charter sailing yachts in excellent condition.

You can also enjoy a Day Sailing trip around Kos and nearby islands. Swimming, snorkeling and sea- food lunch in local restaurant.

Happy sailing!!!

Poi.Name: Istion Yachting
Poi.Description:
​Istion Yachting is here to organize the perfect yachting vacation for you. Istion specializes in yacht charters throughout Greece: Cyclades islands, Saronic Gulf, Sporades, Ionian & Dodecanese islands ... starting from one of our main charter bases in Greece: Athens (Alimos Marina), Kos (Kos marina), Lefkas (Lefkas marina) or from any other destination you wish...
For those who wish to try yachting for their first time, Istion yachting will take with you step by step to this new world of pleasure. It will discuss your needs and make plans working close together in order to make it easy and clear.

Poi.Name: Vernicos Yachts
Poi.Description: Vernicos Yacht is located in the Kos Marina and from there you can hire a yacht to make your trip to the nearby islands.

Poi.Name: Samos Sail Yacht Charter
Poi.Description:
​Η εταιρεία Samos Sail είναι ο καλύτερος τρόπος για να εξερευνήσετε τη μαγεία των Δωδεκανήσων και των Κυκλάδων. Κλείστε διακοπές με τα ιστιοπλοΐκα και μάθετε περισσότερα σχετικά με τα τσάρτερ στη Σάμο, Κω, και στο Κουσάντασι. Η βάσεις του Samos Sail για ναύλωση γιοτ είναι απομακρυσμένα από την Αθήνα, το Λαύριο, τη Ρόδο, τη Σκιάθο, την Κέρκυρα και τη Λευκάδα.
Για τους λάτρεις της ιστιοπλοΐας που δεν έχουν αρκετή εμπειρία, επαγγελματικοί κυβερνήτες είναι διαθέσιμοι κατόπιν αιτήματος.

Poi.Name: The Moorings
Poi.Description: ​The Moorings has been providing fantastic powerboat and sailing vacations worldwide for over 40 years. You can trust Moonings to deliver five star service and the most innovative fleet on the market. Yacht rental has never been easier, whether you're looking to skipper yourself, hire a sail or power boat, or charter an all-inclusive crewed yacht - The Moorings has it all.

Poi.Name: Liamis Dive Center
Poi.Description:
Liamis Dive Centre is offering you and your friends or family the unique opportunity of discovering and exploring the magical underwater world of the Aegean Sea.

At Liamis Dive Centre, you will find the unbeatable combination of recognition of international standards, dive training expertise, commitment to safety, and customer service.

Poi.Name: Kos Divers Dive Center
Poi.Description:
Back in 1991 three local diving instructors Kostas, Kalle and Mattias decided they wanted to open their own diving center and after working together for many years, Kos Divers finally opened its doors to the public in 2003.
10 years later and still maintaining the same enthusiasm for sharing the underwater world with divers old and new, Kostas finds himself as the established owner of a dynamic and successful PADI 5* Diving Center, Kos Divers!

Poi.Name: Sea Spirit Diving resort
Poi.Description: The Sea Spirit Diving Resort is situated in Psalidi, 4 kilometres outside Kos Town at the Ramira Hotel and in Kardamena at Mitsis Hotels complex (Norida, Summer Palace, Family Village, Blue Domes ). At either one of our resorts, you can take your first ever diving lesson and discover the mysteries and miracles of the underwater world or if you a certified diver, you can choose from a selection of dives located just a short breath away or even choose your own location.

Poi.Name: The Sponge Divers
Poi.Description: ​The Spone Divers Diving Center is a PADI, IANTD authorized Diving Center, supported by DAN EUROPE and follows programs and training methods while providing divers with internationally recognized certifications.

Poi.Name: Poseidon
Poi.Description:
​Plati: For swimming and snorkeling, BBQ, greek salad, souvlaki, tzatziki, bread and fruit.

Kalymnos: The island of Greek Sponge Divers. Excursions to fjords and natural beauties. Traditional drinks: ouzo and wine.

Pserimos: Visiting an uspoiled Greek island, with clean crystal waters and beautiful sandy beaches.

Poi.Name: Archangel Michael
Poi.Description:
​Archangel Michael, offers everyday cruises to the beautiful Greek islands.

After spending time in a lonely beach located in the island of Kalymnos you will have a chance to savour an original Greek barbecue and the beverages of your choice. Also, you will have an opportunity to visit the beautiful small Greek village of Pserimos and enjoy yourself by sunbathing on a soft white sandy beach.

The boat guarantees real sailing.

Departure time: 11:00 am

Arrival time:18:00 pm

Prices includes: Barbecue souvlaki, fresh grill fish, salads, fruits, and drinks during the whole day.

The crew is looking forward to meet you on the boat!!!

Poi.Name: Friederike
Poi.Description: Spend an unforgettable day on an excursion on a traditional wooden boat with barbecue, snorkeling in crystal water, sightseeing on Kalymnos the sponge island and much more in a fun packed day.

Poi.Name: Kalypso Boat
Poi.Description:
​Kalymnos two hours: The island of sponge divers. Visit to sponge workshop.

Plati 1 hour: Swimming - diving and water slides from the boat.

Pserimos 1:30 hours: Swimming and relaxation on the beach.

Poi.Name: Family Day
Poi.Description:

Don't miss this chance to enter the East with its distinct smells and tastes like the famous Turkish grilled meat "donner".

Poi.Name: Rhodes
Poi.Description:
Α medieval treasure beautifully preserved throughout the centuries. Wander around its magnificent Old City, surrounded by medieval walls with seven gates, and admire the Palace of the Grand Master, the most awe- inspiring building in the whole island. Take a romantic stroll around the famous Street of the Knights and feel like a holy warrior in shining armour, or a noble princess. Peer into the historic past of the city with a visit to the Archaeological Museum.

Mandraki, the (ancient) harbour, is distinguished from the outer harbour by the 3 windmills and the fortifications at the end of the dock. During your quest, you will encounter some of the city’s most remarkable buildings: the National Theatre, the Courts, the City Hall and the Governors Palace. Visit stunning wonders of nature, such as the Seven Springs, the Valley of the Butterflies and Rodini Park, a green valley with running waters, small bridges and many peacocks, the trademark of the park! Get a deeper insight into the rich history of the island through your visit to the breathtaking Acropolis of Lindos and Ialissos as well as Ancient Kamiros, which were all powerful cities in ancient times. Well-preserved castles, like the ones of Kritinia and Monolithos are also waiting to be discovered!

Poi.Name: Flyboard Kos Island
Poi.Description:
​The new and revolutionary water sport has arrived in Kos! Wear your equipment and you're ready for take off!

You will find it in Psalidi beach .

Poi.Name: Kamari Port
Poi.Description: ​The port lies In the beautiful bay of Kefalos, on the western ​part of Kos. The port acts mostly as a shelter for local fishing vessels. For water supply you can ask the fishermen office. Super markets, restaurants and tavernas are near to the port.

Poi.Name: Mastichari Port
Poi.Description: ​Mastichari, on the northern coast of Kos is a pitcuresque seaside village with a small port. The port of Mastichari services local passenger routes to other islands in the Dodekanese. The port offers good shelter except for the E and NE winds. Supermarkets, restaurants and cafe are nearby. Fueling by truck is also possible.

Poi.Name: Kardamena Port
Poi.Description: ​ The port is used for local routes to Nisyros and Tilos and is also space for a limited number of tourist vessels. It offers exceptional shelter for winds. Fueling is available upon request. Supermarkers, restaurants and cafe are nearby.

Poi.Name: SupeJet Boating
Poi.Description:
​poseidon 1 is a big powerful jet-boat with 2 turbo charged engines giving over 700 hp and 2 large jet units producing all the fun for you ! ! ! ! !
what this boat does is really amazing it does 180 degrees spin and deeps which they can upgraded till 270 degrees if you like it,power break stops,fishtales wave jumps and the best part is that you will have some very special holiday memories that you will want to share with all your friends ! ! ! !​
Poi.Address: Kos Akti Miaouli next to the bus terminal

Poi.Name: Hermes Shipping Agency - Georgios Dinoris
Poi.Description: ​Hermes Shipping Agency provides quality services since 1986. Specialized in incoming and outgoing tourism, ticketing, cruise handling. ​

Poi.Name: Therma
Poi.Description:
​

There is no way to go to Kos and not to experience the unique experience offered by hot baths.
Just in front of the beach in a round pond surrounded by rocks are hot springs. On the one hand invades every so cold sea water and the other hot thermal waters gush from the bowels of the earth, creating bubbles on the surface.
​

 

Enter slowly through the water. When you get used to the temperature did not want to go out. The body and mind relax within a few minutes. A natural spa. There may be people around you, beside you, just you, but there is silence as if you are in a sacred gathering. It is known that the hot springs have beneficial properties to the body for all ages.


Not only the largest resort to them for the treatment of rheumatism and arthroitides and at younger ages spas offer except relaxation and wellbeing, beautiful and glowing skin, therapeutic well as gynecological diseases!

The beach at Thermes of Kos has a rare wild beauty, surrounded by large rocks and has dark pebbles.

Poi.Name: THE SPONGE DIVERS
Poi.Description:
​The Sponge Divers is a PADI,  IANTD authorized Diving Center, supported by DAN EUROPE and follows programs and training methods while providing divers with internationally recognized certifications.

 Offers you the opportunity to discover the beauty of underwater Kalymnos.

Poi.Name: POSEIDON
Poi.Description: ​WATER SPORTS JET SKI WATER SKI WAKEBOARD RINGO CRAZY SOFA SEA BIKE CANOE

Poi.Name: Symi
Poi.Description:
​While approaching the port of Symi, one has the overwhelming feeling of entering a perfectly painted image of a scenic traditional village. As a rule, people remain agape and cannot take their eyes off the spectacular sight.
The few who can resist the superb spectacle of the town of Symi stretching its impeccable architecture – all of the buildings there have been listed - on the slopes of the surrounding hills, take off their eyes to look at their book guides. They see the picture of the port of Symi printed on their books. They know it might have been photoshoped; in all likelihood, they expected it to be better than the real thing. Still, when they lift their eyes again to marvel at the breathtaking sight, they realise it belies their expectations: Symi is more than words or photos can say!

Poi.Name: Tilos
Poi.Description:
An island with rough, mountainous and verdant volumes, hills and plains where four hundred species of flowers and herbs germinate, inhabited by numerous species of rare birds (Bonelli’s eagle, hawks, nightingales, goldfinches, herons, bee-eaters etc). It has picturesque villages and charming beaches. This is the place where the last elephants of Europe lived: The dwarf-elephants appeared in the island 45,000 years ago and disappeared 4,000 years ago. 

The whole island constitutes a vast ecological park and is protected by international treaties. In ancient times, Tilos was famous for its herbs and became really prosperous during the classic period. During that period the famous female poet, Irinna, lived on the island. The island extends over a surface of 63 km2, its coastline is 63 km long and it has 500 inhabitants.

Our focus is always on quality, and our range of make and size allows everybody – regardless of taste or experience – to happily tour around our intriguing Kos island.

At Moto Traffic Motorbikes Rentals we are proud of many years of specialized service in the small-vehicle hire industry, and we guarantee the quality and maintenance standards, with best prices.

It is in operation since 1985 under different structure and with different corporate name. A company with a wide experience in all branches of tourism, is working all these years as an individual tourist partner in the area of Mastichari. 
Thousands of satisfied guests had been served, and many of them keep  coming over and every year.  Thus the typical business relationship between client-service provider, had been turned  onto an extraordinary trusty friendship.
Agency's new working structure respects the human tourist approach, and pays further emphasis to IT, modern organization, and prospects.​

Poi.Name: Trust
Poi.Description:
​Founded in 1980, Trust Rent a car has grown to become one of the largest family owned Agencies on the island of Kos. Remaining independent has enabled us to offer a friendly and professional service, while maintaining the cars to a high standard and offering competitive daily and weekly rates. 

Safety has always been the number one priority of Trust. All of our vehicles are regularly inspected and serviced, with not third party, but full insurance and road side recovery. 

 Not only do we specialize in cars, jeeps, scooters and 4 wheeled quad bikes but we have launched out to offer self drive motor boats . The dream to personally sail a 40 ft yacht can also come true. 
 
With one easy stop at trust, you can get all you need to make your holiday complete. You will be surprised at the special discounts and deals that are on offer. Call in for a friendly welcome and go with trust.
